Science-backed new year’s resolutions

Each year, many of us set resolutions to improve our lives, like saving money, getting fit, or enhancing well-being. Often overlooked is the role of materials science in achieving these goals. From fuel-efficient vehicle materials to performance-enhancing workout fabrics, everyday materials are key allies in our journey. Check out these popular New Year’s resolutions and how science makes them possible.

Driving toward a lower-carbon future

Dow is committed to leading climate protection across industries. Through our 'Protect the Climate' commitments, we are making good progress to decarbonize our manufacturing facilities while developing innovative products to support our customers’ efforts to reduce their greenhouse gas emissions.

Pioneering pickleball performance with Wilson

Despite 50 years of stalled innovation, Wilson tackled environmental waste from non-recyclable, pressurized cans. Collaborating with Dow, they developed the Triniti tennis ball, integrating Dow plastomer technologies for a lively bounce, consistent performance, and durability without pressurized packaging.

Infinite Potential.

We exist to unlock the infinite potential of aluminum to advance a world free from waste.

See How We're Doing It
Investing in what matters most.

Explore how we’re changing the status quo, setting a higher bar, and making strides toward a more sustainable future through product and people.

The Aluminum Bottles Report

Award-winning innovation and state-of-the-art quality control have always been at the heart of the products our team delivers, which is why we recently released our first white paper.

Decarbonizing the Aluminum Sector

Ball Corporation and Novelis are participating in a World Economic Forum-led effort – the First Movers Coalition (FMC). Both companies are part of FMC’s aluminum sector, whose members pledge purchases towards reducing the industry’s CO2 footprint.

Infinite Potential

Imagine a world where sustainable aluminum products that are forever recyclable are available. It’s not an unrealistic dream… we’re making that world happen today.

At Ball, we exist to unlock the infinite potential of aluminum to advance a world free from waste. To do so, we’re leading the charge in the sustainable production of aluminum cans and packaging, while investing in recycling in communities across the globe.

It’s a win for our product. It’s a win for the planet.

Learn About Infinitely Recyclable Products
TRUE CIRCULARITY BY 2030
A vision for a perfect circle.

At Ball, we aim to advance sustainability through aluminum packaging. We’re looking to set the example, but it’s only by working together that the aluminum can industry can achieve true circularity.

As an industry, we must work together to:
Improve Recycling Rates
Increase Recycled Content
Design for Circularity
Support Policy Change
The power of CAN.

To reach our 2030 sustainability goals, we must first achieve circularity – the continued lifecycle of reusable materials – in our local communities and across the globe. Together with our customers and partners, we are focusing our efforts on these four areas:

Learn About Our 2030 Initiatives
Collection

Let’s make deposit return systems more convenient and readily available. Together, we can reach a recovery target of 90% for all beverage containers globally.

Sorting

Barriers for investments in material recovery facilities and sorting technology delay progress. Combining product design guidelines and the right tipping fees and material bans can bring the change we need for sorting innovation.

Recycling

Increasing local recycling efforts reduces imports of virgin raw materials. By increasing recycling efforts and ensuring technologies are able to produce maximum yields and quality, the global footprint for new aluminum production can be drastically lowered.

Recycled Content

We want to ensure that recycled content gets used as best it can. This can be supported by creating a standard for recycled content, providing incentives to keep packaging-to-packaging loops closed and by offering tax incentives for recycled materials versus virgin.

Our Customer Promise
Our customers inspire us at Berry Global.  We collaborate with them around the world…whether large or small, global or local…to create packaging and protective solutions that meet performance requirements, environmental impact targets, and aesthetic needs. This commitment to our customers is best expressed in our customer promise. Innovation for the World. Solutions for You.
     
This customer promise summarizes how our unmatched global capabilities, sustainability leadership, and deep innovation expertise can deliver on our customers needs while tackling some of the toughest industry challenges.  We are committed to helping each customer make transformative leaps toward their sustainability goals and solve whatever challenges comes next in their business.
Our Expertise

Berry Global offers industry leading material science knowledge and manufacturing capabilities to help customers achieve their business and sustainability goals in a circular economy.

With 25+ focused design and innovation centers, we prioritize customers’ strategic goals and objectives by delivering innovative solutions, driven by the strength of our people and diverse industry expertise.

With 240+ locations around the world, Berry Global can serve any customer’s needs. Large customers appreciate our ability to scale to their large order demands and seasonal requirements while smaller customers require our local agility to support them close to their own manufacturing facilities.

News & Insights
New Shot Bottle Helps Meet Demand for Improved Gut Health with Fast Speed-to-Market

The design expertise and manufacturing flexibility of Berry Global’s Agile Solutions were instrumental in the fast development and bringing to market of a fully recyclable 150ml bottle, produced by Berry Agile Solutions for M&S Food’s X ZOE Gut Shot.

Berry Global and true™ Skincare Collaborate to Deliver Refillable Deodorant

Berry collaborated with men’s skincare brand, true™, to launch a refillable deodorant in Poland. The new deodorant sticks launched in spring 2023 and are available in 200 Douglas Perfumery stores, airport duty free concessions, and on true’s online store.

Berry Partners with Lassonde to Use Recycled Content in Private Label Lemon and Lime Bottles

Berry collaborated with food and beverage leader Lassonde Industries Inc. to incorporate 25% post-consumer recycled (PCR) content into its private label lemon and lime juice bottle.

Berry Supports the ‘Accelerating a Circular Economy for Plastics and Recycling Innovation Act’

This solutions-oriented legislation aims to increase plastics recycling and prevent plastic from ending up in the environment.

PaperSeal™ Saves the Tray

PaperSeal™ offers brands and retailers the opportunity to replace high-barrier, Modified Atmosphere Packaging (MAP) plastic trays with a barrier-lined paperboard alternative.

Our People

What I have loved the most of my decade-long tenure at Newell Brands has been the spirit of teamwork and the valuable connections I’ve made across various functions and regions. I have gained tremendous perspective and knowledge from incredible leaders and partners, alongside the global reach of our top-notch brands.

Liz Rueda Fuentes

SENIOR PROGRAM MANAGER, DIVERSITY & INCLUSION

Working at Newell Brands has been a rewarding experience because I am surrounded by so many colleagues who take ownership of their impact on the company. With the abundance of opportunities to grow and learn, I am encouraged to be ambitious with my career and to seek advancement opportunities. At Newell, I am constantly inspired to be a better teammate, to lead with integrity and to aspire for greater because that’s what I see in everyone around me.

Dana Paulita Harmond

MANAGER, CORPORATE STRATEGY

Newell Brands provided the jumpstart to a much-needed change in my career at a pivotal time in my life and has provided many new opportunities for me since then. People are the essential part of why I love working at Newell and they also are the center of my work. Ensuring the overall health and safety of our employees around the globe is my top priority. By nature, people all have the same aspiration no matter where they’re located, especially when it comes to safety - everyone wants safety for themselves and their families. The diversity of people, positions and functions, and countries Newell operates in gives you a glimpse into the tapestry of this incredible work family.

Thierry Gendre

SAFETY DIRECTOR, EMEA & APAC

I joined Newell Brands in 2009 and immediately noticed that it was different than any company that I’d worked at before. This company was completely invested in the growth and success of one of its best assets - the employees. There is a strong culture of growth through training, development and creating opportunities for advancement. I love that the success that I’ve experienced at Newell is due to shared values, attitudes and behaviors with my team members, as well as the awesome leaders.

Cheryl Brooks

SENIOR COORDINATOR, LEARNING & CULTURE

I’ve worked at Newell Brands for almost 10 years, but since 2018, I’ve led Human Resources at our Acuña manufacturing site where more than 1,300 people proudly work to produce Oster® blenders. What I love the most about working here is that Newell allows high performers to achieve their career goals and passion for winning is a core value. I enjoy collaborating across different countries and regions. I love our brands and I'm proud to work in a company that really cares about their people and the communities where we operate.

Yazmin De la Cruz

SENIOR MANAGER, HUMAN RESOURCES

Newell is a company that you can grow with and gain experience in numerous types of positions until you find one that works best for you. I also love that Newell gives people opportunities to volunteer on employee and community committees. People at Newell are friendly, and we engage positively with one another throughout the workday. Our teams in the factory work great together. It is inspiring to work for a company that motivates teams to work hard and feel appreciated.

David Sexton

COUNTER CYCLE, INVENTORY CONTROL

After being employed in the gaming industry for several years, I looked to make a career change in hopes of expanding my knowledge of corporate design. I was hired by Newell Brands for a three-month contract position to cover an employee out on leave. You could say things have gone well – I’m now going on almost ten years here! Our culture is different at Newell Brands. We’re given the chance to succeed. Opportunities to take ownership and present ideas are limitless, which makes working here extremely rewarding.

Fiona Johnson

MANAGER, CORPORATE COMMUNICATIONS DESIGN

My work at Newell Brands has enabled me to grow my specialized design skills and further my leadership abilities over the past 11 years. The best thing about my job is that I collaborate with incredibly talented people. Additionally, the company's adaptability has meant new challenges such as leading different teams, assuming various responsibilities, navigating between businesses, and tackling big challenges. I always feel like my contributions are meaningful and are connected to the company’s goals.

Lea Stewart

SENIOR MANAGER, INDUSTRIAL DESIGN

Products for a better home
Masco Corporation is a global leader in the design, manufacture and distribution of branded home improvement and building products. Our portfolio of products enhances the way consumers all over the world experience and enjoy their living spaces.
We believe in better living possibilities—for our homes, our environment and our community. Across our businesses and geographies, we seek out these possibilities to grow ourselves, enhance our consumers’ lives, create long-term value for our shareholders and improve the world around us.
As a family of companies, we share a strong ethical culture and continuous improvement mindset driven by people and backed by an operating system designed to leverage our scale.

Join us as we seek solutions, innovate, succeed and make our world a better place.

Global Leaders in Metal Packaging

Sonoco is proud to announce the successful completion of our acquisition of Eviosys. This integration deepens our metal packaging portfolio and expands our global footprint, establishing us as a leader in metal packaging solutions worldwide. Together, we are committed to driving sustainability and delivering high-quality packaging that meets our customers’ evolving needs while continuing to innovate for a better future.

Read the Press Release

Whether it’s as simple as delivering a convenient, nutritious snack after school or as complex as reducing food waste, feeding the hungry and preserving the planet—we have packaging solutions for you.

Bringing healthy, fresh food to tables around the globe

Improving the safety and durability of things we rely on most—from cars to high-rises

Ensuring goods like refrigerators, washers and electronics arrive safely at their destination

Protecting medicines so they can reach people in need

We’re delighted that Sonoco’s EnviroCan® with paperboard end, part of our EnviroSense™ product range, is helping pladis on their journey to make its packaging easier to recycle and fulfill the requirements of its sustainability agenda. We’re looking forward to helping them with their other ranges in the future.

Philip Brown, UK Sales Manager, Sonoco Consumer Products Europe

Enriching lives through innovation

For over 50 years, and in approximately 25 countries, our 6,000 associates have been using science and ingenuity to create innovations that play a critical role in the everyday lives of many millions of people.

About Huntsman
Markets
Aerospace and Defense

Improving assembly productivity, reducing weight and extending the lifetime of parts are imperative to reduce costs in the aerospace and defense sector. As a leading global supplier of high-performance materials, Huntsman’s products help customers improve production processes, realize complex designs, reduce weight, and remain compliant with stringent standards and lower long-term maintenance costs.

Product Spotlight
Huntsman's Battery Materials Portfolio Enables Transition to Electric Vehicles

Huntsman’s battery materials are critical to the reliable operation and long working life of lithium-ion batteries. These materials also help increase cell capacity by enabling higher conductivity, thicker cathodes, and higher silicon loading in anodes. The Huntsman battery materials portfolio can enable emerging technologies such as high silicon anodes, solid state electrolytes, flexible batteries, and safer aqueous production methods.

Investor Relations

Huntsman Corporation is a publicly traded global manufacturer and marketer of differentiated and specialty chemicals with 2023 revenues of approximately $6 billion. Our chemical products number in the thousands and are sold worldwide to manufacturers serving a broad and diverse range of consumer and industrial end markets. We operate more than 60 manufacturing, R&D and operations facilities in approximately 25 countries and employ approximately 6,000 associates within our continuing operations.

Vision 2030

Watch the video that explains the next phase of profitable growth and superior returns following the pivot of Carlisle’s portfolio of businesses to a pure play building products company and the highly successful achievement of our Vision 2025 objectives three years ahead of plan.

 

Carlisle Companies Incorporated is a leading supplier of innovative Building Envelope products and solutions for more energy efficient buildings. Through its building products businesses – Construction Materials (CCM) and Weatherproofing Technologies (CWT) – and family of leading brands, Carlisle delivers innovative, labor-reducing and environmentally responsible products and solutions to customers through the Carlisle Experience. Carlisle is committed to generating superior shareholder returns and maintaining a balanced capital deployment approach, including investments in our businesses, strategic acquisitions, share repurchases and continued dividend increases.

Vision 2030 builds on Carlisle’s track record of success and our pivot to a pure play building products portfolio, leveraging mega trends around energy-efficiency, labor-savings, and the re-roofing cycle, to deliver superior returns. Watch our Vision 2030 video or view our Vision 2030 slide deck to learn more.

ABOUT NOVOLEX

Novolex - A Leader in Choice, Innovation, and Sustainability

Novolex develops and manufactures diverse packaging products for the foodservice, delivery and carryout, food processor and industrial markets that touch nearly every aspect of daily life in multiple industries. The Novolex family of brands provides customers with innovative food and delivery packaging and performance solutions for their business needs today while investing in research and development to engineer more sustainable choices for the future.

Food Packaging

Foodservice packaging customers include quick service and traditional dine-in restaurants, institutional and cafeteria settings, entertainment venues and C-stores that offer food.

Industrial

Industrial markets include businesses in the e-commerce, agriculture and horticulture, banking and security, construction, sanitation and janitorial, and healthcare sectors.

Food Processor

Food processers include commercial beverage manufacturers, produce suppliers, and dairy and confectionary producers.

Mueller Industries

Mueller Industries, Inc. is an industrial manufacturer that specializes in copper and copper alloy manufacturing while also producing goods made from aluminum, steel, and plastics. It is headquartered in Collierville, Tennessee and comprises a network of operations in North America, Europe, Asia, and the Middle East. Its products include tubing, fittings, valves, vessels, and similar items for plumbing and HVACR related piping systems, as well as rod, forgings, extrusions, and various components for OEM applications. Products are distributed into sectors such as building construction, appliance, defense, energy, and automotive.

Learn More

PIPING SYSTEMS
CLIMATE PRODUCTS
INDUSTRIAL METALS
slide 1 of 10
Piping Systems

Since our earliest beginnings, we have been pioneers in piping systems. Today, Mueller Industries companies provide a wide array of tubing, piping, fittings, valves, and related products to support various residential and commercial flow systems. From the drinking water in your home to oxygen lines in your doctor’s office, our companies’ products help to support these important systems.

View All Our Companies
Our Culture

Our values are the foundation of our culture. With every customer we support or company in our portfolio, we know that our ingrained sense of dedication, innovation, ambition, passion, and responsibility is clear. These traits have been a part of our company since its earliest beginnings and will continue to help us in our future success.

The Lifecycle of a Raindrop®

From the moment rain enters our drain until we safely return it back to its natural environment, we take the responsibility of managing the precious resource of water very seriously.

Learn About the Lifecycle of a Raindrop
Capture
Stormwater enters our basins and filters work to remove sediment and debris.
Conveyance
Our pipe directs water away from parking lots, freeways and fields so areas stay dry and neighborhoods stay safe.
Storage
Chambers ensure water flow is managed appropriately, guarding against flooding.
Treatment
Finally, our water quality products clean water before returning it to lakes and streams.
Engineered for the if, ready for the when.

Everyday stressors are just as significant as severe weather events. Our resilient stormwater management solutions are designed to handle both, providing long-term value and rapid recovery when time is of the essence.

Redefining the Packaging Life Cycle

Formed in 2018 by packaging industry leaders BWAY, MAUSER Group, National Container Group (NCG) and Industrial Container Services (ICS), we're Mauser Packaging Solutions.

 

With our global network of manufacturing, reconditioning, and recycling facilities, we deliver high-quality, sustainable packaging solutions across the full packaging life cycle - closing the packaging loop.

 

We're Redefining Sustainability and providing solutions that have a positive impact on businesses and the planet.

Read More
180+ facilities around the globe

We deliver the packaging solutions customers need, anywhere in the world. The breadth of our global network, together with our full lifecycle capabilities—create supply chain consistency and superior packaging performance that no other company can provide.

View Our Locations
Your trusted industry partner

From food, beverage, personal care and pharmaceuticals to chemicals, petrochemicals, agrochemicals and paints, we work with customers in a broad range of industries to solve complex packaging challenges—simply and sustainably. Our passion for innovation, collaboration and creativity makes us the go-to partner.

THIS VIDEO HAS NO SOUND

Leading the way to a sustainable future with packaging and supply chain solutions. 


Menasha Corporation consists of two companies with one vision for a sustainable future.

Menasha Packaging is a North American supply chain leader, offering high-end packaging, unique displays and point-of-sale materials, among many other services.

ORBIS optimizes supply chains with sustainable packaging, including reusable containers, pallets, dunnage, bulk systems, and metal racks that reduce costs and enhance profitability.

No matter what you’re looking for, both companies can drive efficiency and innovation across your supply chain. It’s what we call The Power Behind Possible. Welcome to Menasha Corporation, a 175 year-old, family-owned company that’s dedicated to your business and the planet we all share.

Take a look at who we are, what we do, and why we've been around for 175 years.
Hear from our President & CEO, Chris Drees, about why we are excited about our 175th anniversary.
Our Companies

Menasha Packaging is the largest independent provider of packaging and supply chain service solutions in North America, designing, printing, and fulfilling graphic packaging, display and merchandising solutions for over 1,800 brands, both in-store and online.

Learn more

As an international, closed-loop supply chain leader, ORBIS offers reusable plastic totes, pallets, containers, protective interiors, carts, and metal racks to help world-class companies move their products faster, more sustainably, and more cost-effectively.

overview

PMC Global, Inc. is a privately-held management company and resource partner with corporate offices in three states and more than 20 subsidiaries in 10 U.S. states and 17 countries. From its roots in the early stages of the plastics polymer modification industry a half century ago, PMC has branched out through start-ups and strategic acquisitions to dominate select markets in plastics/chemicals, manufacturing, food service, packaging and finance. PMC and its subsidiaries employ more than 3,500 worldwide.

history

Philip Kamins began his career in the plastics industry in the early 1950’s. In the 1960’s he began to invest in plastics manufacturing facilities. Within a few years, the acquisition of plastics companies multiplied and in 1974 the Plastics Management Corp. was established. Now known as PMC Global, Inc, its primary function is to manage and support investments across a wide range of industries. Mr. Kamins’ outlook for the future includes internal growth and expansion through acquisitions, both domestic and international. Mr. Kamins just welcomed the third generation into the business and is excited to see the business continue to allow family involvement.

philosophy

“The freedom to succeed, the support to grow” PMC Global’s start-ups and acquisitions encompass a diverse range of industries, markets, customers and cultures and embrace a wide variety of business and management styles. We encourage the sharing and leveraging of ideas, resources and technologies across our entire portfolio. Our decentralized management philosophy allows each subsidiary under the PMC Global umbrella to maintain a strong individual identity with enormous flexibility and the freedom to succeed through local decision making. At the same time, PMC Global stands at the ready to provide each business growth-oriented support in the form of capital investments; administrative, legal and financial guidance, and access to worldwide business and market intelligence.

operations

PMC Global’s North American operations are managed by PMC, Inc. Group. Our European manufacturing operations are managed by PLIC (PMC Leaders in Chemicals) and we maintain a strong presence in Asia via PMC Science-Tech Industries (Nanjing) Co. Ltd.  All three subsidiaries are independently managed by seasoned professionals boasting extensive knowledge of their industries, local cultures and business climates.

WELCOME TO THE AZEK® COMPANY

As the innovative manufacturer of beautiful, low maintenance, and environmentally sustainable outdoor living products, AZEK is deeply committed to making a lasting impact on the world by accelerating the use of recycled materials.

Consistently recognized as the market leader in innovation, quality and aesthetics, products across The AZEK Company’s portfolio are made from up to approximately 85% recycled material and primarily replace wood on the outside of homes, providing a long-lasting, eco-friendly and stylish solution to consumers.

OUR PURPOSE

Revolutionizing outdoor living to create a more sustainable future.

WHY WE’RE DIFFERENT

We leverage our material science to create premium branded products that are stylish, long-lasting, low-maintenance and environmentally sustainable.

WHERE WE’RE GOING

We are positioned to profitably grow the overall market, the category and our presence by engineering new products that accelerate conversion to better performing, more eco-friendly materials.

Our manufacturing platform includes four different companies, specializing in metal fabrication and production of custom plastic parts and PVC pipe for some of the world's top brands.

Mid Oaks Investments is a private investment firm that invests its own capital in middle market companies that possess a substantial opportunity for value creation. We seek to partner with entrepreneurial management teams with the foresight and vision necessary to elevate an enterprise to the next level of performance.

Since we invest our own capital, we can support the building of a business over time and are not burdened by a fixed holding period for any of our investments. The ability to approach our investments with a long-term investment horizon allows us to consider exiting only when others are positioned to add even greater value.

Our team is comprised of former CEO’s, CFO’s and business owners who have spent many years running companies involved in a variety of different businesses. Our significant operational experience has given us a first-hand understanding of the challenges that management teams face as they strive to grow their business.

To learn more about Mid Oaks, please browse our website and download our latest brochure.

ALBANY INTERNATIONAL CORP.
About Us

Albany International is a leading materials science developer and manufacturer of engineered components, using advanced materials processing and automation capabilities, focused on two core businesses.  

Albany Machine Clothing is the world’s leading producer of custom-designed, consumable fabrics and process belts essential for the manufacture of all grades of paper products. 
Albany Engineered Composites is a growing designer and manufacturer of advanced materials-based engineered components for demanding aerospace applications, supporting both commercial and military platforms. 

ALBANY ENGINEERED COMPOSITES

ALBANY MACHINE CLOTHING

DRIVING PROGRESS WITH RESPONSIBLE SOLUTIONS
Sustainability & Stewardship

At Albany International safety and sustainability are core to our mission and values. Our business is centered around driving success for our customers. Our products are designed for performance and quality, while enabling our customers to improve their environmental footprint through more sustainable and efficient processes and end products. As a partner in our customers’ value chains, we have also made a commitment to reduce our carbon footprint across all operations.

Empowering Technology with Purpose

At Enpro, our purpose lies in helping others achieve theirs.

We are shaping a safer and sustainable future through our investments in a wide-range of leading-edge capabilities that drive success for our customers, development of our colleagues, growth in our communities and protection of our environment. ​

Driven to design and apply critical solutions for an evolving world, we meet every challenge with bold ideas rooted in generations of collective experience. ​

The way we work is built upon shared principles of integrity, curiosity and imagination. We take pride in our collaborative culture that centers on Safety, Excellence and Respect. ​

We work together to make the world better, for today and tomorrow.

Investing in Growth

We're entrepreneurs at heart, with a diverse portfolio of businesses that provide engineered solutions for a wide range of global markets. As a global growth firm, we’re developing businesses by providing resources and investment for the long-term. We partner with innovative companies who work well with us, complement our expanding portfolio, and align with our values. Through investments in our people and community, we provide an opportunity to learn and grow and make an impact in the communities where we work.

Our Values

Announcements
Sparks Belting celebrates 75 years, new location

Conveyer solutions manufacturer relocates to larger plant to pave the way for increased production. The Grand Rapids Business Journal featured Sparks Belting's 75th Anniversary at their new location.

READ MORE
Announcements
GHSP Appoints Automotive Tech Industry Veteran Dan Dawiedczyk as President

GHSP, a global provider of mechanical and electromechanical systems and portfolio company of JSJ Corporation, today announced the appointment of Dan Dawiedczyk, formerly Aptiv’s Vice President and Managing Director of Connection Systems Americas, as its President. With over 25 years of engineering and management experience, Dawiedczyk is well suited to scale, develop, and manage GHSP’s existing automotive business and all new technology market operations throughout the world. Dawiedczyk brings deep expertise overseeing design, production, and commercialization with experience in global technology companies providing solutions to a wide variety of markets and applications. Dawiedczyk will report directly to JSJ CEO, Nelson Jacobson.

READ MORE
Announcements
CES 2021: GHSP Launches New Advancements to Improve Vehicle Safety and Reduce Virus Exposure in Cars and in the Home

The company is revolutionizing a car’s center console to increase safety and eliminate distractions with the introduction of its dual stack rotary and multifunction controller. These two controllers enable drivers to intuitively reach down and gain control of their car without having to take their eyes off the road. GHSP is also introducing grēnlite™, its line of UV-C treatment products, to personal vehicles...

READ MORE
Announcements
JSJ navigates complexities of supply chain disruption, mandatory vaccines

MiBiz interviews JSJ's Chairman, CEO & President, Nelson Jacobson to get his perspective on how the pandemic is impacting local & global manufacturing businesses.

READ THE COMPLETE MIBIZ ARTICLE
JSJ Gives Back

We’ve invested millions in programs and education, humanities and arts, health, the environment, and human and social service programs through the JSJ Foundation, which was created in 1983. One of our core values is stewarding our legacy, or giving back to the community that has generously supported us throughout the years.

SEE HOW
Where It All Began
Innovating Since 1919

We have a great deal of experience in developing our businesses and building true partnerships, with the future always in our foresight. JSJ is a joint venture from Alvin E. Jacobson, Sr., Paul A. Johnson, and B.P. Sherwood, who rebuilt Grand Haven Brass Foundry after a fire in 1919 and officially formed JSJ in 1970. From a small beginning in Grand Haven to a global presence as a growth firm, we’ve stayed true to our values and roots.

OUR LEGACY
Our Portfolio of Businesses

Our businesses represent manufacturing, distribution, and service companies with a passion for problem solving on a global level. Each company is unique, but all hold the same values as JSJ.

EXPLORE
Engineering Solutions

We’re headquartered in Grand Haven, Michigan and Tianjin, China, and our portfolio of businesses call many locations throughout the U.S. and world home.

Steward of Sustainability

As part of the Menasha Corporation, ORBIS Corporation is committed to driving the circular economy. Reusable packaging is good for your supply chain and the planet. And, that’s what consumers expect. 

90% of consumers want companies to do more than turn a profit

75% of consumers expect businesses to support efforts to stop climate change

ORBIS helps you switch from single-use, expendable packaging to fully reusable solutions that reduce waste. So as you move product, you’re working toward a more sustainable world for future generations.  

See Our Commitment

Innovative Products

ORBIS moves more than product. ORBIS moves the industry forward to keep your supply chain evolving.

Solutions for Any Supply Chain

From manufacturing to retail and beyond, ORBIS offers the broadest range of reusable packaging products to streamline your entire supply chain.

Working with the Ocean in Mind

Thanks to our repurposed plastics, ORBIS diverts nearly 1 million pounds of single-use plastic from the world’s oceans.

A Better Way with ORBIS.
A Stronger Partner

Our goal is to collaborate and facilitate a better way for you to move and protect goods in your supply chain. We analyze your business to design and execute an integrated reusable packaging program that increases your efficiency while reducing your environmental impact.

Get Started
What Our Customers Say
Automated Systems

Automated systems, combined with reusable packaging, help companies eliminate human error to improve accuracy, productivity, and efficiency to get products into the hands of the consumer more quickly.

Learn more >

Get the efficiency and hygienics critical for today’s food plants with a wide range of pallets, totes and bulk packaging to move, store and protect products.

Learn more >
Bakery

From ingredients to finished goods, ORBIS helps efficiently store, move and merchandise product in your bakery supply chain.

Learn more >
Automotive

Reusable packaging improves flow along automotive supply chains, including launches and operations for OEMs and Tier Suppliers for electric vehicles (EV).

Learn more >
Agriculture

Reliable handling and optimized transportation is made possible with reusable packaging in the agricultural industry. Growers are looking for efficient methods to protect and transport vegetables, seed and fruit during field harvest, in-plant handling, staging and processing.

We Take Pride and Responsibility in Being a Global Leader
As Toyoda Gosei continues to grow, we work to inspire a brighter global future.

We have grown to become a global supplier that aims to deliver the highest levels of quality, innovation and satisfaction to customers worldwide. Our global network, combined with our extensive range of products, allows us to serve our customers anywhere in the world.

In order to bring Toyoda Gosei’s legacy of world-class manufacturing to local markets, the Toyoda Gosei Group has increased its global presence with locations in Canada, the United States, Mexico, and Brazil. Toyoda Gosei’s team members work together to combine innovation and processes to achieve the highest quality standards, while striving to deliver the best possible products to our customers.

Lubrizol’s 2024 Innovations Enhance Life, Make the Modern World Work Better

Welcome to Lubrizol.
The Lubrizol Corporation, a Berkshire Hathaway company, is a science company that delivers specialty chemistry with global reach and local presence. Our science delivers sustainable solutions to advance mobility, improve well-being and enhance modern life.
Where Science Meets Modern Living

Discover how Lubrizol enhances every facet of our lives from the way we move, to how we take care of ourselves and our families, and how we work and play.

News and Insights

Read the latest Lubrizol announcements, from our latest technical innovations to business updates that advance our work.

New ACEA E8 Technology

The European lubricant market is upgrading to higher performance lubricants to meet the demands of the existing Euro VI legislation and enable cleaner powertrain technology. Lubrizol® CV9660 is designed for simplicity and enables complexity reduction, reducing formulation costs and simplifying portfolios.

Delivering Value Beyond the Device

Today’s medical devices need to be smarter, minimally invasive, and capable of delivering better patient outcomes. Lubrizol’s expertise helps meet the demand for more innovative devices.

The Leader in Flexible & Specialty Rigid Packaging

With our advanced printing methods, focus on sustainability, and extensive manufacturing and converting capabilities, we take your packaging to the next level.

Get Started
Existing Customer?
Trusted by Leading Brands

For more than 60 years, we’ve been at the forefront of packaging, delivering superior customer experiences fueled by impactful market insights, innovative sustainable packaging products, and rapidly scalable services that ensure our customers’ products stand out on the grocery shelves.

60+
Years of Experience
3.2k

Our Key Capabilities

Printpack leads the packaging industry in manufacturing capabilities while delivering a best-in-class customer experience. We are committed to Preserving and Enhancing People’s Lives through sustainability, efficient processes, and providing quality products to our customers and consumers.

Flexible Packaging

Our vertically integrated manufacturing approach includes flexographic, rotogravure, and digital printing, along with extrusion and adhesive lamination capabilities.

Specialty Rigid Packaging

Our specialty rigid packaging includes barrier co-extrusion and thermoforming capabilities.

Healthcare Packaging

Our healthcare packaging includes header bags, peelable pouches, and forming films that protect the integrity of medical devices and equipment.

Value-Added Services
Graphics and Prepress

We offer a multitude of the latest prepress technologies for exceptional print quality. Improved color saturation, ink transfer, image highlight detail, and expanded tonal range are just a few of the ways we can improve the visual impact of your package.

Learn More
Analytical Lab
Field Service Team
Innovation Sessions
Sustainability

We believe that the use of sustainable materials for packaging is the future. To that end, we have a team dedicated to developing Printpack Preserve™ packaging structures which include recycled content, recyclable plastic, paper, and compostable materials. With over 100 pre-qualified letters, we are committed to helping our customers not only improve their speed to market but also reach their sustainability goals.

Our Sustainability Initiatives
Recycled Content

Recycled content packaging is recognized by consumers for its environmental benefits, making it easy for brands to connect with customers.

Curbside Recyclable Paper

Paper packaging is the most widely recycled type of packaging because it is curbside recyclable.

Compostable packaging

Printpack has a portfolio of compostable films, inks, and adhesives to allow brands to design for certified-compostable packaging.

Recyclable Polyethylene

Our pre-qualified recyclable polyethylene (PE) packaging offers many of the benefits of current flexible packaging with one huge advantage - store drop off recycling.

Why Printpack?
Best-In-Class Customer Service

We develop a true understanding of the customer as an organization and as individuals to build custom packaging solutions for their brand.

Innovative Solutions

We work with brands to create packaging that drives progress and achieves a competitive advantage in an ever-changing market.

Powerful Supply Chain Expertise

We’ll partner with you to design a customer-centric order and inventory management program to ensure your packaging supply chain runs smoothly, efficiently and transparently - every day.

Experts in Multiple Packaging Formats

We help brands deliver custom, leading-edge package designs that stand out on the shelf in a wide variety of markets.

1965-2025

This year marks Klöckner Pentaplast's 60th anniversary. We’re proud to be celebrating this milestone.

Our history
INSIGHTS
kpNext MDR1: new sustainable solutions for medical device packaging
At Klöckner Pentaplast (kp), we are dedicated to pushing the boundaries of what’s possible in sustainable packaging options. With the introduction of kpNext® MDR1, we’re taking a significant step forward by expanding our renowned kpNext family of pharmaceutical blister films into the medical device packaging market.
Read more
INSIGHTS
Case study: Newell Stores
For Northern Ireland's Newell Stores, the search for packaging that could meet these demands, while staying ahead of evolving regulations, led the retailer to a market-first launch of kp Infinity® Top Seal.

Newell Stores’ journey shows how innovative packaging can transform food-to-go operations, while putting sustainability front and centre.
Read more
INSIGHTS
Beyond the pill: how packaging enhances patient experience and medication adherence
In the world of pharmaceuticals, the conversation often revolves around the efficacy of the medication itself. However, an equally important factor in achieving positive health outcomes is the packaging that delivers these medications to patients.

NEW PRODUCT
kpNext® MDR1 sustainable medical device films
kpNext® MDR1 is an advanced copolyester film that offers medical device manufacturers the same best-in-class performance, clarity, and protection as traditional packaging films with the added benefit of being 100% compatible with the #1 PET recycling stream.
kpNext® MDR1
NEW PRODUCT
New kp rXPS / kp rXPS MAP traditional protein trays containing up to 50% recycled polystyrene
Our range of traditional protein trays now contain up to 50% recycled polystyrene and are available in a wide range of shapes and sizes. They are a more sustainable alternative to standard XPS trays made from virgin material.
kp rXPS / kp rXPS MAP
We innovate, design and manufacture for sustainable solutions that our customers use to package and protect products in daily situations around the globe such as blister packaging for pharmaceutical products. And we understand our obligation and responsibility to champion a circular economy where plastics are a source of valuable raw material, especially in the medical device packaging industry.

Klöckner Pentaplast launches kpNext® MDR1: sustainable medical device packaging film

Klöckner Pentaplast (kp) is proud to announce the launch of kpNext® MDR1, a new medical device packaging film that expands its kpNext® brand beyond pharmaceutical blister films and into the medical device sector.

October 02, 2024

kp launches best-in-class duo of recyclable, barrier flow wrap films raising the PE and PP recyclable content bar to new levels

Klöckner Pentaplast (kp), a global leader in sustainability-focused food packaging solutions, has announced the launch of two new recyclable barrier flow wrap films: kp FlexiFlow® EH 155 R and kp FlexiFlow® PH 255 R.

September 26, 2024

Education first: Klöckner Pentaplast expands innovative TikTok campaign to Europe

Klöckner Pentaplast (kp), a global leader in sustainability-focused food packaging solutions, is broadening its award-winning TikTok campaign for its range of single use, fully recyclable food-to-go packaging - kp Infinity® - to new European markets.

MATERIALS THAT MATTER,
INNOVATIONS THAT ENDURE.
We create. We innovate. We sustain.

As a material-science thought leader and manufacturer, Jadex is driven to innovate essential product solutions that support the health of consumers and the environment.

A material difference for a sustainable future.

At Jadex, we create solutions based on your needs. We are your partners, your industry experts, your problem solvers. Our dynamic group of companies each innovate with intent, manufacture solutions that help reduce waste, recirculate materials, and regenerate nature. These are just some of the ways that Jadex makes a material difference every day.

Our Role

We are the catalyst, turning problems into solutions that allow our partners and consumers to use materials more effectively and responsibly.

Our People

We are makers dedicated to transforming materials into essential products that help improve lives and reshape the future. 

Our Products

We strive to make practical and sustainable solutions. We create more from less, always with an eye on tomorrow.

The cornerstones of our success: Meet the four Jadex operating companies that make a material difference every day.

From high-quality medicine bottles to certified child-resistant caps that help give parents peace of mind, Alltrista’s pharmaceutical, consumer health, and industrial applications are everywhere.

We craft straws and cutlery with options that are both home and industrial-compostable. We do more with less, always with the future in mind. 

From healthcare, automotive, and consumer products to military and marine electronics, and even lawn care essentials, Shakespeare can be found in thousands of products the world depends on every day.
Masters of zinc, Artazn is more than coins. Our zinc products help restore bridges, build homes, and bolster high-rises. We recycle, reuse, and repurpose our zinc, continuously innovating solutions that make a material difference.
Makers of News

Our dynamic leadership, constant innovation and endless commitment to sustainability continue to push the materials-science world forward. Learn about our industry-leading expertise, and how it can change you and your businesses for the better.

Jadex enters definitive agreement to sell Lifoam

Jadex announces it has entered into a definitive agreement to sell the sale of its Lifoam division to Altor Solutions. This transaction, detailed in the latest press release, marks a significant shift in Jadex’s business focus. The deal underscores Jadex’s commitment to refining its strategy. Read more about the impact of this acquisition and what it means on PR Newswire.

Read More
LifeMade Receives 2024 Bronze Rating from EcoVadis

LifeMade has received the 2024 Bronze Medal Sustainability rating from EcoVadis. This rating places LifeMade in the top 35% of assessed companies, highlighting its commitment to sustainability and ethical practices. President and CEO Brian Searfoss emphasized the company's dedication to advancing its sustainability efforts.

Read More
Artazn Receives 2024 Silver Rating from EcoVadis

Artazn earned a 2024 Silver Medal Sustainability Rating from EcoVadis, placing in the 86th percentile. EcoVadis evaluates companies on Environment, Ethics, Labor and Human Rights, and Procurement, and has rated over 130,000 companies since 2007. Artazn's ranking demonstrates its commitment to sustainability. President Mike Schubert praised the team's dedication to upholding high standards.

OUR BRANDS

About

PPC Flex is an advanced flexible packaging manufacturer, focused on providing purposeful, powerful packaging solutions. We understand the impact that the perfect packaging partner can have on the growth of your business. That’s why we develop a deep understanding of your needs to deliver the best packaging, every time. We help you grow by finding the right flexible packaging solutions that preserve products, create incredible shelf presence, and deliver a better product experience.

Finishing

We stand out in the world of flexible packaging due to our cutting-edge finishing technology. We harness the power of the latest technological breakthroughs, enabling us to create top-tier products while maintaining highly competitive practices. Thanks to our ongoing commitment to investing in top-notch packaging equipment, our products are exceptionally versatile.

Capabilities

SURVIVAL STORIES

LEARN MORE 

When the Heat Rises, Pelican Stays Cool: A Fire Survival Story

We recently received a remarkable tale from Don, a Pelican Customer from Alabama. It's a story that illustrates the resilience and exceptional performance of Pelican™ coolers in the face of extreme situations.

READ MORE 

Ice Storm No Match for Pelican 1510

In early February 2022 an ice storm came through my home town of Memphis which according to the NY Times caused around 60,000 people to lose power for almost a week. I was leaving for a work trip the next morning, so I had already packed the car in expectation to leave for my early flight. The storm hit and in addition to losing power, the accumulation of ice on the trees combined with high winds caused one of my neighbor's trees to fall directly on my SUV in the middle of the night.

READ MORE 

Crushproof and Crashproof

I was on my way home from teaching a women’s “stop the bleed” and firearms safety course at the Homestead (Florida) training center for Triad medical training. I had my Pelican 1615 Air Case tied down in the bed of my truck with my range setup inside. I was at a stoplight when I heard two cars coming up behind me at a high rate of speed. I realized they were coming into my lane and not stopping. The lead car struck the rear of my truck spinning me into the intersection and ejecting my Pelican Case from the bed of my truck. My Pelican Case ended up in the middle of the intersection and got dragged under a pickup truck, until it got run over and became dislodged. The gentleman who’s truck it was under noticed the case dislodge from under his truck and took it home. Upon inspection he found my fiancé’s business card in the ID slot and reached out, reuniting me with my gear!

READ MORE

Containers that embrace your product and advance your brand.

At Ring Container, before a product label goes on, the industry's best thinking goes in. Our innovations make PET and HDPE plastic packaging and containers light yet durable, beautiful yet practical—for manufacturer, retailer, and consumer alike. If you are looking for superior consumer product packaging, look to the industry leader, Ring Container. Exceeding expectations by design®.
                                        

Quality solutions that are good for your business and the environment.

Ring provides cost-effective, quality packaging solutions and support you can rely on. We’re more than just a vendor. You can count on our team to serve as a true partner in supply chain management. Our long-term customers choose Ring because we’ve proven our ability to be consistent, reliable, and responsive.

Reliable service built our reputation in the industry, but our innovative sustainability efforts keep us moving forward. We’re already helping our customers meet sustainability goals with cost-effective solutions.

Every container is a collaboration.

The containers we make are the result of an ongoing collaborative relationship with customers whose needs, vision, and input are vital for success. We don’t merely work for our customers; we work with them to solve problems, meet new product and market challenges, and take advantage of unique opportunities. The results are containers that perform better on the shelf and on the bottom line.  

We are proud to partner with many outstanding companies who place high value on Ring’s product performance and sustainable practices. Our customers include Bay Valley Foods, Bunge, Cargill, ConAgra Brands, Hormel, Stratas Foods, and Ventura Foods.

The largest pharmaceutical, medtech and in vitro diagnostic companies in the world count on Phillips Medisize to bring their breakthrough ideas and innovative branded products to market – with confidence.

As a contract design and manufacturing organization (CDMO), we work closely with our customers to deliver proven, highly engineered products that help millions of people live healthier, more productive lives. Autoinjectors and pens for delivering insulin, GLP1, epinephrine and other life-saving drug treatments. Advanced, wearable injection pumps. Point-of-care and at home diagnostic tests. Electrophysiology technology. Continuous glucose monitoring systems. And more. Explore how we can help you.

A 3rd prestigious award for Ascendia Pharma and Phillips Medisize for the SKYTROFA ® Auto-Injector - The first-of-its-kind product that enables convenient and efficient preparation and delivery of SKYTROFA—a vital growth hormone treatment for children.

Phillips Medisize Expands Its Inhalation Drug Delivery Capabilities

Molex, a parent to Phillips Medisize, announced that it has completed, through an affiliate, the previously announced acquisition of Vectura Group Ltd. (Vectura) from Vectura Fertin Pharma Inc., a subsidiary of Philip Morris International Inc. Phillips Medisize is a leader in the design and manufacturing of innovative products for the pharmaceutical drug delivery, in vitro diagnostic and medtech markets. With the addition of Vectura, the company now offers a wider range of formulation, device design, combination product development and manufacturing services.

What to Expect From Your Free In-Home Estimate

Our initial consultation provides the information we need to give you the best price on windows you'll love for a lifetime.

1. Find The Right Style

Your Champion representative will walk you through our product options, custom styles and colors, and warranties. They'll also help you compare the value of our windows to other window providers.

2. Review Price & Financing

Together, we'll review current promotions, calculate your estimated monthly payment and energy bill savings, and determine the best financing options for your project.

3. Same Day Quote

You'll get an exact, no-obligation quote for both your new windows and installation, and we'll discuss next steps in the home transformation process.

Our History
1937
Mrs. B Nebraska Furniture Mart

Future Foam really started with the opening of Nebraska Furniture Mart back in 1937 in Omaha, Nebraska. Built by one woman, Rose Blumkin, after she had raised four kids, Nebraska Furniture Mart grew into the largest furniture retailer in the country. Rose worked in her stores until she was 100 years old. Mrs. B, as they called her, is a legend in Nebraska and in American retailing.

1950
Charles Schneider Furniture

One of her daughters married Charles Schneider who started Charles Schneider Furniture to provide merchandise for Rose’s stores. But Charles soon realized furniture was going to need lots of this new polyurethane foam. So back in 1958, he started Future Foam.

1958
Future Foam Begins

So back in 1958, he started Future Foam. Charles Schneider Furniture closed after over 70 years. But Future Foam now has over 30 plants making foam for car seats, marine upholstery, carpet underlay and especially furniture. Maybe the couch or chair you’ll sit on to watch TV tonight. That all began after incorporation on September 15th, 1958.

Contech Engineered Solutions

Contech Engineered Solutions offers civil engineers, owners and contractors a comprehensive portfolio of innovative, cost-effective site solutions, including bridges, drainage systems, erosion control, retaining walls, sanitary sewers, and stormwater management products. 

With over 60 facilities across North America, Contech provides localized expertise and support, encompassing regulatory guidance, engineering calculations, site-specific drawings, solution development, cost estimates, and installation assistance. Our commitment to quality and environmental stewardship ensures durable and sustainable infrastructure solutions.

We look forward to working with you on your next project.

PIPE

Pipe materials for drainage systems, culverts, and sanitary sewer applications. 

STORMWATER MANAGEMENT

Biofiltration, treatment, and detention solutions for every site.

EROSION CONTROL

Temporary and permanent erosion control & hard armor solutions for any application.

BRIDGES & STRUCTURES

Innovative, modular solutions for crossings, culverts, and bridges.

RETAINING WALLS

Segmental retaining wall systems to fortify infrastructure, secure soil, and reinforce grade change.

REHABILITATION & RELINE

Permanent, fully structural solutions for rehabilitating culverts and pipe.

Why Quality Manufacturing Matters to Our Customers

Our commitment to quality is not just about meeting industry standards; it’s about exceeding expectations, ensuring peace of mind, and delivering long-term value. Customers choose Contech because they know they can rely on our products to perform as promised, even in the most demanding conditions. This dedication to quality manufacturing enables us to stand out as a trusted partner in the industry, ensuring that every product we deliver is crafted with precision, integrity, and care.

 
Optimizing Wastewater Management with Large Diameter Pipes

In the realm of sanitary sewer storage solutions, large diameter pipes stand out as a beacon of cost efficiency and practicality. These pipes, often ranging from 30 inches to 120 inches in diameter, offer a multitude of benefits that cater specifically to the needs of municipal and industrial wastewater management systems.

What Is Aluminized Type 2 Pipe? A Guide for Civil Engineers

When it comes to stormwater management and culvert design, selecting the right pipe material is crucial for performance, longevity, and cost-effectiveness. Enter Aluminized Type 2 (ALT2) pipe—a material that has become a staple in civil engineering projects. But what makes it so special? This blog will cover everything you need to know about ALT2 pipe and why it’s often the top choice for stormwater and drainage systems.

Hydrodynamic Separators (HDS) have been a staple in stormwater management for over twenty years. Choosing the right HDS unit for your project can be challenging, but understanding key design considerations can help guide you through the process. This blog post reviews several important factors to consider when sizing your HDS unit.

ABOUT US

Founded in 1976, Poly-America is part of a group of privately-held corporations headquartered in Grand Prairie, Texas, in the heart of the Dallas/Fort Worth metroplex.

Poly-America has several subsidiaries and divisions. Carolina Poly is located in Chester, South Carolina and services the East Coast. Poly-West, a plant in Henderson, Nevada, services the West Coast. Up North Plastics, Inc., a fourth manufacturing site, is located in Cottage Grove, Minnesota. Additionally, we operate Pol-Tex, a reprocessing and scrap service center, out of Mont Belvieu, Texas.

Poly-America produces several product lines, all within the polyethylene family. The group of companies comprises the world's largest producer of polyethylene construction film and the highest quality trash bag manufacturer in the United States. Poly-America is also the most technologically advanced and largest recycler and compounder of polyethylene in the world.

Poly-America is committed to understanding and exceeding the needs and expectations of our customers by providing them with competitively priced and top quality products. Poly-America’s track record of, and commitment to, continuous improvement is based on the pursuit of enhancing customer experience through our motivated employees who consistently strive to improve our company and products.

Over the years, the United States Patent and Trademark Office has recognized our innovation by granting us many patents, including:

ANCHOR HOCKING GLASSWARE​

We began in 1905 with a simple goal: make the glass that homes really need. Anchor Hocking glassware showcases the genius of utility that stands the test of time. Our glass bakeware, drinkware, serveware, housewares, food storage items, mix & measure items, and pantry solutions are as relevant and trend-savvy today as they were more than a century ago. We just keep innovating for you as we reinforce the favorites that you’ve loved forever.

The ultimate solution for transporting and carrying your delicious homemade dishes – Our 3qt Bake Dish with Truelock Locking Lid™! This innovative product ensures secure and fresh food during transit, with the insulated tote keeping it hot or cold for hours. Perfect for potlucks, picnics, and family gatherings, it’s your go-to for serving food in style. No more spills or lukewarm dishes – transport your culinary creations with peace of mind and in impeccable style.

EXPLORE BAKEWARE

Starting your day off right is essential, and breakfast is the perfect opportunity. Luckily, the right kitchen utensils make preparing a delicious breakfast both easy and enjoyable. Whether you’re a busy mom, having brunch with friends, or a hostess who’s looking to wake up your special guests with a beautiful morning spread, find our top product picks to make prepping, cooking, and cleaning up, a walk in the park.

CLEARLY INSPIRED
LET’S BAKE BEAUTIFULLY

Laurel Bakeware is crafted in America with Tempered Tough® Glass, designed to bake perfectly every time.

EXPLORE BAKEWARE
LET’S LATCH & STORE

We know that a meal is about more than just a meal, which is why Anchor Hocking TrueLock Locking Lid Food Storage containers preserve each moment. TrueLock Locking Lid Food Storage keeps foods fresh with our air-tight freshness seal, a leak-proof design and tempered tough glass.

EXPLORE HOUSEWARES
LET'S GET SOCIAL

@anchorhocking

LET’S SUPPORT AMERICAN JOBS
CRAFTED IN THE USA SINCE 1905

We’ve been making Anchor Hocking glassware right here in the USA for more than a century. For all that time, our products have remained a staple in kitchens around the world by staying on the edge of craftsmanship and in the center of American-made quality. 

Supporting American jobs is a source of great pride for us, and it’s important to our customers too. They appreciate our dedication to the workforce here at home. And abroad, “made in the USA” means something else – quality.

LEARN OUR STORY
ANCHOR HOCKING GLASSWARE: VERSATILE, DURABLE, SAFE, AND 100% RECYCLABLE

You know that friend who has your back, is steady and supportive, and also always pushes you to be all you can be? That’s us: the first to arrive and the last to leave, helping you prep, bake, serve, and clean up with style and without a fuss. 

It’s simple. Utility can be smart and beautiful. Style can still have function. Innovative is also durable. From our family to yours, thank you for supporting us through the years. We look forward to serving you with Anchor Hocking glassware for many more years to come

Meet Our Experts at Booth D89
Your Healthcare Contract Development and Manufacturing Partner

With expanding expertise and new vertically integrated global capabilities, MGS is transforming our customers’ most pressing challenges into innovations that improve lives. Learn why we’re the healthcare contract development and manufacturing organization (CDMO) of choice for today’s leading Pharma, Diagnostic & MedTech Companies.

DISCOVER THE MGS ADVANTAGE
GLOBAL HEALTHCARE MANUFACTURING

Our expanding global footprint gives customer access to our CDMO expertise and experience, strategically located closer to home.

GLOBAL LOCATIONS
SPEED-TO-MARKET FROM IDEATION TO DELIVERY

Our Complete Value Chain Solution mitigates risk, maximizes resources, and gives customers easy access to smarter strategies and customized end-to-end solutions. A seamless transition from development to tooling to automation to high-volume manufacturing speeds the delivery of the highly critical, high-precision components customers count on.

Healthcare Product Design and Development

Our human touch approach guides our process from idea generation through final MDR/FDA approval. Deep R&D competencies, extensive healthcare industry experience and strong technical expertise support customers in all aspects of early healthcare product design and development. Be sure to set your program up for long-term success.

LEARN MORE
World-Class Tooling Worldwide

Building on MGS’ rich tooling heritage and the acquisitions of forward-thinking moldmaking partners, we deliver precision tooling solutions – from multicomponent to stack to high cavitation molds. Learn how our global moldmaking expertise and capacity enable us to deliver your large-scale, complex medical programs with speed and precision.

LEARN MORE
Customized Automation Solutions

Our custom automation equipment technologies optimize your final production environments, leveraging decades of expertise in toolmaking and molding. Complete in-house capabilities integrate custom assembly, part orientation and performance validation technologies to maximize performance and productivity at customer locations and our own.

LEARN MORE
Global Manufacturing

Our expertise culminates in manufacturing the highly critical, high-precision components leading healthcare innovators count on. With a focus on Quality, Precision Molding and Value-Added Assembly, we deliver manufacturing excellence from six state-of-the-art facilities. Access more than 250,000 sq. ft. of cleanroom manufacturing capacity now strategically located closer to you.

LEARN MORE
MARKETS
Learn why we’re the contract development and manufacturing partner of choice for today’s leading Pharmaceutical, Diagnostic & MedTech Innovators.

PHARMACEUTICAL
	
JOIN A WORLD-CLASS MANUFACTURER

We invest in our people, technologies and expanding our global capabilities to bring essential healthcare innovations to life around the world. MGS is a place where your career knows no bounds. Experience state-of-the-art manufacturing technologies, access to ongoing training opportunities and impact lives by producing the products that you and your loved ones may depend on daily.

SIG partners with Ellen MacArthur Foundation to accelerate circular economy for packaging
SIG is proud to announce its network partnership with the Ellen MacArthur Foundation. This collaboration aims to push forward the transition towards circular packaging systems, reinforcing SIG's commitment to environmental stewardship and innovation.

SIG Group listed in Dow Jones Sustainability Indices
SIG Group is proud to announce its inclusion in two Dow Jones Sustainability Indices (DJSI) for the first time. This milestone confirms SIG as a best-in-class company for environmental, social, and governance (ESG) performance.

Dairyland first to bring an SIG aseptic carton filling machine to Pakistan providing operational flexibility and impactful shelf presence
Dairyland, the leading provider of premium UHT and fresh milk products in Pakistan, has made a significant move in the local dairy industry with the implementation of the first SIG XSlim 24 Aseptic filling machine for aseptic cartons in the country. Known for its quality products sourced directly from its own farms, Dairyland aims to expand its offerings while maintaining its high standards in nutrition and quality.

ShoreFlor™
Worry-proof Flooring

ShoreFlor™ with Searenity Waterproof Technology™ is where beauty meets practicality. Its waterproof design ensures protection against spills and splashes, while the scratch resistant surface helps retain its beauty. Plus, this floor is residential steam mop approved, making it easier than ever to keep the floor clean! ShoreFlor™ combines style and functionality, resulting in a worry-proof floor.

View ShoreFlor™
Divine Prosecco WP071
EverGen™
Designed to Impress

Tarkett Home’s first WPC, EverGen™, brings an unparalleled level of realism and durability to the home. Designed to impress, each plank features a distinctive pressed bevel edge, resulting in a more authentic appearance. With an impressive 8.0 mm overall thickness, including a 1.5 mm IXPE attached pad, EverGen™ provides the perfect balance of beauty and performance.

View EverGen Flooring
Flourish 718
Fresco
Elevate Your Space

Fresco is a captivating blend of style and texture that is sure to make a statement in any space. This collection features a large-scale distressed linen look, bringing a unique and sophisticated aesthetic to the room. Whether you’re looking to add a bold focal point or a subtle touch of elegance, Fresco is sure to catch the eye and elevate the room. Like all Cloud 9™ carpets, Fresco is a Solution Dyed Polyester yarn that has a natural resistance to staining and fading. It is family and pet-friendly, stylish, and has a truly soft feel!

View Fresco Carpet

POLYVANTIS offers high-quality, engineered thermoplastic film and sheet products across various industries, ranging from building and construction to consumer electronics.  We focus on research and development with commercial partners and experts from leading academic institutions. Together we bring improvements that help customers make the world better, faster, lighter, and cheaper in ways that also protect the environment.

POLYVANTIS’ LEXAN™ Polycarbonate film and sheet portfolio are backed by advanced technical support and application development services worldwide. We are dedicated to meeting our customers’ changing needs with our unique high-performance LEXAN™ film and sheet portfolio. Through our services and product portfolio, we help our customers to create innovative designs with better functionality, reduce systems costs and develop environmentally responsible applications.

UFP TECHNOLOGIES

Shaping Innovation

UFP Technologies is the trusted design, engineering, and manufacturing partner to turn your vision into a reality through best-in-class comprehensive solutions primarily for medical devices and sterile packaging, as well as other highly engineered custom products.

MedTech

MedTech evolves at breathtaking speeds. To keep pace, you need forward-thinking collaboration to develop your idea and anticipate the challenges at each phase of the process. UFP MedTech is the ideal partner to help you accelerate single-use and single patient devices from development through launch and manufacturing.

LEARN MORE

Advanced Components

For aerospace, defense, automotive, and other highly engineered components and packaging, our advanced engineering capabilities and materials expertise ensures optimal designs and seamless implementation to make your vision a reality.

LEARN MORE

FULL-SERVICE PROCESS

Design & Development through Manufacturing

Trust UFP Technologies to turn your vision into reality with best-in-class comprehensive solutions based on our vast depth of engineering expertise. Our nimble and dynamic team will work with you to create custom designs from foams, films, plastics, nonwovens, fabrics, and other specialty materials. All with the ultimate goal of positioning your ideas for success.

Customer
Challenge

From the initial stages of development, we review your project from every angle, assigning a dedicated team to fully understand the unique needs and potential challenges before we start.

Design
& Material Selection

We act as an extension of your R&D and engineering teams, applying our vast materials expertise and design skills, so that each decision we make is optimized for the application.

Engineering
& Prototyping

We understand the importance of delivering sound engineering and rapid prototypes. Our in-house tooling capabilities and custom equipment allow us to execute quickly and accurately, producing prototypes within 72 hours.

Pre-Production
Validation

Mitigating any potential risks through quality management systems ensures a seamless transition from prototype to full-scale production.

Commercial
Production

Our turnkey solutions include high volume manufacturing, packaging, and supply chain management through multiple global locations to get your product to market quickly and efficiently.

CAREERS

It's great to be here!

If you’re looking for a professional, energetic, family-oriented work environment that fosters professional development and career advancement, you’re ready for UFP.

THE EPITOME OF INNOVATION

At Lacks, we are driven by an uncompromising passion to push boundaries and redefine what’s possible. For over 60 years we have been at the forefront of the finish décor industry and continue to lead the way with exceptional products designed and engineered by a team with a fervency for perfection. From the intricate 3-D texture of Tessera® to the rich hues of our Spinelle™ metal finishes, we provide a level of freedom that allows designers to dream outside the expected.

EXPLORE FINISH TECHNOLOGIES
Interior

The freedom to explore new textures of real metal and chrome finishes in a nearly endless selection of color options gives designers the ability to create décor trim level differentiation without limits.

LEARN MORE
Exterior

More than mere ornamentation, our exterior décor trim systems and the technology behind them are among the most advanced in the industry. From grilles to appliqués we can make any vehicle more attractive.

LEARN MORE
Wheel

Lacks delivers lightweight wheel assembly and component technology that provide designers the freedom to imagine outside traditional restraints.

LEARN MORE
Carbon Fiber

High performance meets the height of design freedom with the lightweight durability of Lacks Carbon Fiber™ wheels.

LEARN MORE
RESULTS THAT SPEAK FOR THEMSELVES

LACKS PARTNERS WITH SOME OF THE TOP AUTOMAKERS IN THE WORLD CREATING INNOVATIVE DESIGNS THAT RESHAPE INDUSTRY STANDARDS. FROM INNOVATIVE INTERIOR TRIM COMPONENTS TO ALLURING LIGHTER WEIGHT WHEEL SYSTEMS, HERE ARE JUST A FEW OF OUR RECENT COLLABORATIONS.

READY TO RACE

When you’re looking for every thousandth of a second, every component has to perform. That’s why Lacks is proud to announce that Dodge has selected Lacks Carbon Fiber™ wheels as the high-performance foundation for the world’s quickest production vehicle.

QUALITY ENGINEERED COMPOSITES

Molded Fiber Glass Companies (MFG) is a leader in the composites industry with one of the largest full-service networks of custom molding and assembly facilities in North America. Headquartered in Ashtabula, OH, MFG has helped clients develop and improve their products, efficiency, and bottom line since 1948. We deliver excellence in manufacturing, design engineering support, R&D and program management. Our Best in Class quality and management practices make MFG a trusted supply partner to leading manufacturing companies.

LEARN MORE ABOUT MFG

70 YEARS AND STILL INNOVATING

Known as the original manufacturer of the fiber glass body for the iconic Corvette, MFG Companies prides itself as an innovative, family-owned enterprise that spans four generations of the Morrison family. Founded in 1948 by entrepreneur Robert S. Morrison, the company is headquartered in Ashtabula, Ohio, and remains one of the largest employers in the region.

Global Tier 1 Supplier

Mayco International is a global Tier 1 automotive supplier to automotive companies. We use the latest technologies, materials, and concepts to provide our customers with state-of-the-art interior modules.

LEARN MORE

FROM ART TO PART

In our Art, to Part approach, we can provide design, advanced engineering, tooling, manufacturing, assembly, sequencing, logistics, and systems integration services. Mayco International begins each project by engaging every department of our enterprise so that our customer’s end product surpasses expectations. Your drawing board ideas or sophisticated design and our entire company will ensure that you have your final production pieces in the quantities required, at the right time for the right price.

LEARN MORE

WATCH THE VIDEO

START WITH OUR
PRE-CONCEPTUALIZATION SERVICES
DESIGN
ENGINEERING
VALIDATION

A design isn’t finished until somebody is using it.
–Brenda Laurel

DESIGN DRIVES EVERYTHING.

Nothing that is, or has been, happened without design. We can develop a workable design based on a sophisticated prototype or simply an idea on your drawing board. Our designers have the creativity, experience, and knowledge to design with the goal of quality, cost-effective manufactured parts or products that exceed the expectations of our customers.

LEARN MORE

BUILD IT WITH OUR
CUTTING-EDGE TECHNOLOGY
TOOLING

Essential to Art to Part is our tool and die team. Our team employs experts in the tooling industry to build tools to exact specifications. Our specialists are involved from concept to completion. We are dedicated from the beginning of every project to producing precision tooling ready and reliable for mass manufacturing.

LEARN MORE

A manufactured product is a physical embodiment of human energy, a testimony to the magical ability of our species to take raw materials and turn them into things of use, value, and beauty.
– Kevin McCloud

MANUFACTURING

At Mayco International there is nothing so satisfying as watching formless raw materials enter a press to be removed seconds later as a functional product to be placed into the stream of commerce. Our manufacturing division and partner manufacturers produce quality parts to ship or to be assembled here into the desired end product. We pride ourselves on producing our customer’s desired quantities within the required timeframes at the highest level of quality. Manufacturing is the pinnacle of Art to Part and motivates our entire base of operations.

LEARN MORE

FINISHING STRONGER THAN EVER
SEQUENCING & LOGISITICS

You will not find it difficult to prove that battles, campaigns, and even wars have been won or lost primarily because of logistics.–Dwight D. Eisenhower

LOGISTICS ARE PARAMOUNT TO ART TO PART

We don’t consider a job to be completed until quality-inspected parts or products arrive safely and Just in Time to their intended destinations. Our assembly and sequencing departments dedicate themselves to our customer’s timetables. All of our parts or products are expertly packaged and secured, and with our partner logistics professionals, we are then ready and able to safely ship products across the globe or the street; wherever and whenever the product is needed. Art to Part with Just in Time delivery, that is our promise.
