Who we are

Trusscore is changing residential and commercial construction with products that combine sustainable materials with nanotechnology. Our PVC-based wall and ceiling panels are easy-to-install and high-performance replacements for traditional drywall and fiber-reinforced plastic (FRP) panels.

Trusscore makes a range of products suitable for every use-case, products that install four times faster than existing alternatives, and with a durable finished appearance that is unparalleled. Applications include home garages and workshops, commercial projects, including hospitality venues, restaurants and offices, and agricultural applications from barns, to indoor grow rooms, to animal containment – any facility or room that requires a crisp, clean, long-lasting finish.

At Trusscore, we’re passionate about research and bringing material science to our products for better performance and a beautiful appearance.

Our aim, always, is to drive innovation and ensure Trusscore’s building products are on the cutting edge of material science. The result? Products that are incredibly durable, reusable, and recyclable.

Trusscore. Changing the way the world builds interior walls and ceilings.

Trusscore Wall&CeilingBoard has been recognized in the Best of International Builders’ Show (IBS) Awards as one of the most innovative building products. The National Association of Home Builders (NAHB) Best of IBS awards recognizes outstanding building products and services from exhibiting companies.
A partnership made in paradise…

Great building products need great builders. Great builders need great building products.

Trusscore and the Baeumlers are committed to the highest standards of residential and commercial construction and renovation, making use of quality materials and adhering to get-it-right installation methods.

E & T Plastics Mfg. Co., Inc. is where innovation meets precision in plastic fabrication and acrylic solutions. With over 75 years of experience, we have established ourselves as a leader among plastic distributors, delivering high-quality products and exceptional service to our clients.

Our Products and Services
Plastic Distribution Services

At E & T Plastics, we offer comprehensive plastic distribution for a wide range of plastic products. We are committed to delivering precision and quality in every product that we offer.

Acrylic Sheets

Our transparent acrylic sheets are ideal for a wide range of applications. Known for their durability and versatility, our transparent acrylic sheet materials are crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and reliability.

Laser Cutting Services

E & T Plastics is acknowledged as a leader in laser cutting services for over 20 years. Our powerful CO2 lasers can cut component parts with details in acrylic that routers simply cannot match. With cutting power up to 2000 Watts, we can cut heavy gauge acrylic up to 1” thick. Our lasers leave a beautiful, brilliant, highly polished edge even on parts with intricate detail. In fact, even internal cutouts and holes achieve a high luster.

Additional Services

Our saw cutting services enable us to cut your parts with precision accuracy, ensuring each piece meets your exact specifications.

We also have Polishing services which add the finishing touch to your parts with the beauty of a highly polished edge, enhancing both aesthetics and functionality.

We also offer CNC Routing with our six multi-head CNC routers equipped with tool-changing capabilities, we guarantee precise fabrication of your designs. This advanced technology allows us to handle complex projects efficiently and deliver high-quality results.

Featured Services
Laser Cutting – E & T Plastics is acknowledged as the leading manufacturer of non-metal laser cut components for over 20 years.
Saw Cutting – Computerized Saws enables us to cut your parts with precision accuracy.
Polishing – We can add the finishing touch to your parts with the beauty of a highly polished Edge.
CNC Routing – We have six, multi-head CNC routers with tool-changing capabilities
View All
Product Applications

E & T Plastics Mfg. Co., Inc. provides innovative plastic and acrylic solutions that cater to a diverse array of industries and applications. Our products are trusted in:

Aerospace: Our aerospace-grade acrylic materials are lightweight yet durable, making them ideal for high-performance components and structures. They offer excellent clarity and impact resistance, meeting stringent industry standards.
Corrosion Resistant: Designed to withstand harsh environments, our corrosion-resistant acrylic sheets are perfect for applications requiring resistance to chemicals, moisture, and corrosion. They provide long-term durability and low maintenance, ensuring reliable performance in demanding conditions.
Display: Our transparent acrylic sheets are widely used in the display industry for their superior optical clarity and versatility. Whether for retail displays, museum exhibits, or trade show booths, our acrylic materials enhance visibility and aesthetics, showcasing products and information with brilliance.
Food Processing: Compliant with FDA regulations, our food-grade acrylic materials are safe for use in food processing environments. They offer smooth surfaces that are easy to clean, helping to maintain hygiene standards while providing durability and impact resistance.
Graphics: Ideal for signage, visual communication, and artistic applications, our acrylic sheets offer vibrant colors and excellent printability. They are lightweight, easy to fabricate, and resistant to yellowing, ensuring long-lasting performance for indoor and outdoor graphics.
Security and Ballistics: Our bullet-resistant acrylic sheets are engineered to provide superior protection against ballistic threats while maintaining optical clarity. They are used in security glazing and protective barriers, offering peace of mind and safety without compromising aesthetics.

Sustainability
Our commitment

At Cabka, the need for sustainability has driven our innovation and growth. That win-win approach has solved numerous logistic and environmental challenges for our growing roster of clients.

About us
About us

Founded in 1994, Cabka makes pallets and large containers from recycled plastic to offer high quality, sustainably produced load-carrier solutions that help all logistics systems run more efficiently.

Why Cabka?

We are driven by a responsibility to our partners, to our employees, and to the environment. A company with the know-how and the infrastructure to deliver cutting-edge and customized pallets and large containers to fit any need, at any volume.

Worldwide presence

At six production sites around the world, we have more than 700 engineers, logisticians, materials technicians, product developers, tool makers, production specialists, and more. These sites in Germany, the U.S., Belgium, and Spain ensure that our products are available in more than 80 countries—as quickly as our customers need, in the amounts they need them.

Careers

Whether you're starting your career or moving onto your next chapter, Cabka is looking for bold thinkers. Our mission goes beyond creating recyclable transport packaging and into creating a better, sustainable future. We want poeple who are eager to try new things, get involved, and help make that future attainable.

Composites - The Material Of The Future

WHAT WE DO

The Future Pipe Advantage

We set the standard in composite pipe solutions with an unmatched range of glass fiber products across diverse sectors. In an industry where not all non-metallic pipes are created equal, our commitment to quality ensures that every FPI product meets the highest international standards. Utilizing advanced glass fiber technology, our future-proof composite pipe solutions are cost-effective with a considerably lower carbon footprint, as well as offer superior corrosion resistance and longevity compared to traditional materials. With global presence and over four decades of expertise, we excel in innovative solutions that enable us to meet clients’ unique needs. Our proficiency in managing large, complex projects further distinguishes us as the partner of choice in the industry. With a focus on sustainability and environmental stewardship, our strategic R&D investments continue to ensure that we are always shaping the future of industry advancements.

Learn More

OUR TECHNOLOGY

We Produce High-Performance Pipes Through Advanced Winding Techniques

We leverage our expertise to customize solutions for diverse specifications and applications. Our continuous innovation and adaptation enable us to meet clients' specific needs with precision and efficiency.

Our Technology

OUR OPERATIONS

At A Glance

factories

customers

Our state-of-the-art facilities feature advanced manufacturing, testing, and process control systems, driving 53 production lines across 681,000 m².

Our global presence fosters close partnerships with clients, cultivating strong relationships and enabling us to deliver unparalleled value through customized solutions.

Our operations span across the Middle East, Africa, Europe, North America, and Asia, with factories in 10 countries and 25 global offices.

THE FPI ADVANTAGE

Benefits Of Our Composite Piping Solutions

01

Durable And Lightweight

With a high strength-to-weight ratio, our solutions cut down on transportation and installation costs compared to steel or concrete.

Cost Effective And Efficient

Surpassing steel, ductile iron, and concrete in hydraulic performance, our solutions drastically reduce operating expenses. Plus, with shorter lead times and streamlined supply chains, they offer unmatched cost-effectiveness.

Sustainable

Composite pipes require low energy for production and feature a smooth interior surface, reducing the energy needed for fluid circulation. Our composite solutions also offer a significant reduction in carbon emissions compared to metal-based pipe. Due to the lighter weight of composite products, we demonstrate tangible reductions in each product's carbon footprint. This translates to lower Scope 3 emissions for our customers, aiding them in meeting their climate objectives.

Longer Life Cycle

Our pipes offer lasting durability, extending system life cycles well beyond traditional materials. With composites lasting over 50 years, they're a cost-effective solution.

Versatile And Accommodating

Our solutions offer flexible assembly options and handle high pressures, temperatures, loads, and chemical resistance with ease, allowing for complex configurations.

Anti-Corrosive And Resistant

Exceptionally resistant to corrosive environments, our composites endure soils, saltwater, H2S, and chemicals, ensuring pipes last longer.

OUR SECTORS

With Unparalleled Expertise, We Stand Out In Our Industry By Providing Composite Pipe Systems Across A Broad Range Of Applications And Sectors.
Energies
Energies

Both traditional and new energies are essential to driving the modern world. With the global demand for energy ever increasing, FPI plays a pivotal role in the delivery of new energy projects in a sustainable and efficient manner.

Industrial Plants
Industrial Plants

Industrial plants span a wide array of industries, each presenting unique opportunities, challenges, and requirements. A common thread across all sectors is the necessity to maximize uptime and profitability while prioritizing safety and minimizing environmental impact. FPI distinguishes itself by producing a diverse range of products, varying in materials, sizes, and pressure classes, which highlights its exceptional capability and capacity.

Marine
Marine

FPI products, renowned for their excellent corrosion resistance, are ideal for marine vessels, offering cost savings due to lower installation expenses, lightweight properties, and ease of handling. They are used in systems such as seawater cooling and heating, ballast, potable water, swimming pool lines, bilge, and scrubber piping. Additionally, FPI manufactures custom high-quality seawater intake filters. Our composite piping systems are implemented worldwide on various ships, including cruise ships, luxury yachts, tankers, bulk carriers, container vessels, naval ships, FPSOs, and FSRUs.

Offshore Platforms
Offshore Platforms

Offshore platforms are crucial components in energy supply chains, ensuring energy security through production and storage activities. They also play a significant role in addressing climate change via CO2 sequestration. Given the harsh marine environments they must endure, it is essential to use only the most durable materials to maximize reliability and safety. FPI's GRE-RTR products are an ideal choice for offshore applications. Due to their location, offshore platforms must withstand the full spectrum of challenges posed by nature.

Power Generation
Power Generation

The integration of conventional and new power generation systems is crucial for delivering a balanced and transitional approach, ensuring a stable and reliable energy supply. Promoting sustainability in energy sources and minimizing the environmental impact of construction are key areas where FPI is strategically positioned to lead.

Water & Infrastructure
Water & Infrastructure

Water and infrastructure projects are vital components of the built environment, playing a crucial role in societal development by providing clean water, sanitation, and climate resilience. FPI delivers bespoke solutions to tackle these challenges and reduce carbon footprints, ensuring a sustainable future in an evolving world.

Field Services

We ensure flawless installation by managing all project site activities. Our field assistance services include comprehensive training and bonder certification for your team.

Engineering Services

Future Pipe Industries offers optimized pipe systems design and engineering, including stress and surge analysis as well as pipe support packages and detailed engineering.

UNIVERSAL PLASTIC MOLD (UPM) IS YOUR INJECTION MOLDING PARTNER

For more than 60 years, Universal Plastic Mold has been a leading manufacturer of high tonnage custom and large part injection molding thanks to our one-stop facility. We want to provide a single, convenient source for your injection molding needs. Thanks to our diverse array of plastic injection molding equipment, our company can handle all of your plastic injection molding needs. We’ve mastered putting together a complete plastics manufacturing strategy, and our goal is to go far beyond making plastics.

Universal Plastic Mold is proud to offer premier, full-service program management, convenient assembly, product distribution, and logistics services to streamline your manufacturing process and help you keep your company on track. Our comprehensive plastic injection molding services help our clients save money, reduce overhead, cut down on time to market, and increase their overall product quality. This is why we’re the injection mold manufacturer of choice for businesses across the United States.

We are pleased to have the tools necessary to serve the needs of businesses of all sizes across a wide range of industries. Our mission has always been to help our customers produce as many quality products as possible for their needs in any shape or size. Learn more about what makes UPM a leader in plastic mold manufacturing and how you and your business can take advantage of our services today.

ABOUT US
PLASTIC INJECTION MOLDING

When you choose UPM, your satisfaction is our top priority. We work around the clock to meet your needs. With over 300 employees and a full 24/7/365 operation, we have both the plastic injection molding capabilities and management experience to ensure your project is executed properly. We are an all-in-one facility that can handle production, assembly, packaging, warehousing, direct shipping, and more. UPM is proud to deliver turnkey, worry-free results to customers nationwide.

Plastic injection molding is a complex process that touches every facet of your life practically every day. Every time you drink from a water bottle, play with a toy or get in your car, you’re using something that was made through the process of plastic injection molding. Universal Plastic Mold houses all kinds of machines ranging from 240 tons to 2,000 tons so that you can be confident we have the equipment you need for your plastic manufacturing requirements. Whether you need to manufacture plastic parts for your business or are looking to a create a prototype for an entirely new product, UPM is here to help you every step of the way. That’s why we’re a considered a leader among custom plastic molding companies across the nation.

LEARN MORE
PLASTIC MANUFACTURING & LOGISTICS

Among all of the injection molding manufacturing companies in the US, UPM goes above and beyond manufacturing for its clients. We also offer exhaustive logistics services to encompass all parts of the process for our clients, from creating new products through injection molds to custom injection mold tooling to shipping the products to waiting customers, we’re here to help you in any way we can. Our logistics services include both fulfillment and managed shipping. We don’t stop after your product is removed from the injection mold, we’re with you until your shipment is delivered. UPM provides on-site warehousing and shipping container loading and unloading, in addition to distribution center coordination to speed up your time to market and save you money.

LOGISTICS
PROGRAM MANAGEMENT EXPERTISE

Our inventory control helps prevent you from being stuck with products you don’t need, which can unnecessarily inflate your overhead expenses. With UPM, you’re able to produce the exact quantities you need and are no longer forced to rely on unreliable forecasting and hope that you aren’t stuck with too much or not enough. Thanks to our fast turn-around times and exemplary customer service, we’re here to work closely with you to ensure that every project is a success.

With our just-in-time (JIT) inventory strategies, you’re able to get exactly the amounts you need, when you need them to reduce in-process inventory and carrying costs while further improving your ROI. Discover more about how program management services from Universal Plastic Mold can improve the way that you do business.

PROGRAM MANAGEMENT
ISO 9001:2015 CERTIFIED

At Universal Plastic Mold, we are dedicated to being the best and providing the best for our customers. That’s why we always focus on getting better every day through our certified quality management system. UPM is ISO/TS 16949 compliant and ISO 9001:2015 certified. These certifications indicate a thorough set of requirements necessary for both automotive production and service part organizations. Thanks to these certifications, our customers can always rest assured that UPM will provide them with the absolute best in service and quality management. Our priority is to meet the quality requirements of our customers consistently. UPM thanks its employees, internal auditors, and stakeholders for all their hard work and continued support of quality management. Universal Plastic Mold has been certified by ISA to ISO 9001:2015 under certificate number 1715.

WE ARE MAINETTI

For over sixty years, Mainetti has been a trusted partner to the world’s most respected and well-known retail and apparel brands. Our 6,000 employees in 90 locations on 6 continents are on a mission to deliver innovative products and sustainable solutions for our customers. As leaders in the fashion industry, Mainetti drives transformation in supply chains through its Full Circle initiative, focusing on decarbonizing operations and promoting the circular economy. Mainetti empowers its customers around the world to create the future of retail.

GLOBAL LOCATIONS

Mainetti’s experienced professionals understand your needs and are available to assist you. Wherever you are in the world, we have offices, manufacturing plants, and distribution networks to deliver efficient service. We provide innovative and sustainable solutions backed by reliable support on six continents.

Location Directory

INNOVATION IS IN OUR DNA

Since inventing the injection-molded hanger in 1961, Mainetti has focused on enhancing the retail shopping experience. We invest in innovation where it matters most: Products, Processes, Service, Sustainability, and Technology.

Learn More

COMMITMENT TO SUSTAINABILITY

Mainetti creates products that enable customers to achieve their sustainability objectives. Our Full Circle initiative aims to reduce carbon output and utilize 100% renewable energy in our operations by 2030. Mainetti promotes circular economy principles to solve the challenge of single-use plastics.

SIX DECADES OF EXPERIENCE

savings found... again

Healthcare Manufacturer Saves $130K

A manufacturer was price shopping a pallet they had used for decades. They didn't know their legacy wooden pallet was over-engineered and adding unnecessary cost.

We quoted a price on their pallet as asked, but also proposed a new design that does the same job as the old with less material.

Not only is the price tag lower, but the lighter pallet also saves on transport costs, is easier to handle and lessens environmental impact.

MEET OUR MULTI-DISCIPLINARY EXPERTS

Teel has originated engineering improvements and broken new ground in product development for years. We were the first to extrude highly loaded natural fiber plastic composite materials nearly twenty years ago and pioneered multi-layer fuel line tubing in the 1980s. Teel Plastics invented numerous in-line cutting techniques and has built unique manufacturing and production equipment to meet customer demands for years. We continue this cutting-edge tradition today with 3D printing, injection molding, Industry 4.0 equipment, advanced software modeling, and top notch customer service.

WHAT’S NEW AT TEEL

• Teel was named 2022 Processor of the Year by Plastics News!

• We were awarded the 33rd Annual Wisconsin Manufacturer of the Year Award.

• We’ve added a new location in Baraboo which will focus on conduit and gas pipe production.

• Teel was awarded a $6.8 million DOD contract to produce more COVID-19 test kit swab sticks.

• Wonder what it’s like to work at Teel? Watch our video.

TEEL IS YOUR VERTICALLY INTEGRATED PLASTICS SOLUTION PROVIDER

Teel Plastics extrudes high-quality, close-tolerance plastic tubing, piping, and profiles for many applications and offers injection molding as well. We work in many resins from commodity HDPE to high-end PEEK and PPS.  We design and develop products around your requirements, whether you require tubing, plastic cores, multi-layered parts, custom compounded resins, or injection molding services.

HAYSITE REINFORCED PLASTICS

Haysite, located in Erie, PA, is among the worldwide leaders in the formulation and processing of thermoset composite materials. At the forefront in technological advances in composites since 1954, Haysite maintains its competitive advantage through unparalleled product innovation and exceptional customer service.

Haysite offers one of the broadest product lines in the fiberglass reinforced plastics industry, including laminated sheet, custom molded parts, pultruded sheetsand profiles, and engineered molding compound.

Contact Haysite for the best in fiberglass reinforced products.

 

 

 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eNGbc08N0S0

worldwide leader in the formulation and processing of thermoset composite materials

TRANSIT PRODUCTS

Haysite composite products are an excellent fit for transit applications. From third rail brackets to shims and wire supports, products made with Haysite H1000 meet NYCTA stringent specifications 64 and 65 for FST and strength.

learn more

ELECTRICAL INSULATION

Haysite offers a range of products to meet all your electrical insulation needs. Whether it is GPO -1, 2, or 3, Haysite’s Fiberglass Reinforced Plastic Sheets provide our customers with options when faced with critical material requirements.

learn more

CORROSION RESISTANCE

Haysite brings years of experience supplying high quality, consistent sheets used as liners for fume hoods. Low smoke and flame spread values coupled with high chemical resistance make these sheets a standard product choice in most laboratory environments.

learn more

quality
TESTING LABORATORY

Haysite Reinforced Plastics has comprehensive onsite testing facilities to provide product validation and development. Haysite has the ability to perform a wide array of testing parameters, and our trained technicians work diligently to ensure your Haysite products are right the first time, and every time. Haysite’s testing laboratory is equipped to test every product we make in-house.

RIGID & FLEXIBLE POLYURETHANE FOAM AND BUILD-TO-PRINT COMPOSITE PARTS

General Plastics has been meeting the stringent requirements of engineers and design teams in diverse industries for over 80 years. Commercial, military and composite manufacturing companies use LAST-A-FOAM® rigid and flexible polyurethane foam sheet stock for its proven mechanical properties and extraordinary versatility. They also depend on us to provide high-quality, high-performance composite assemblies and finished custom parts.

We work with our customers through the design process, feasibility, fabrication and delivery of custom parts. Whether you need high-temperature tooling boards, core material or custom fabricated assemblies, expect quality, uniformity and stability of materials with General Plastics.

FROM THE OCEANS’ DEPTHS TO DEEP SPACE, WE SHAPE GREAT IDEAS INTO REALITY
CERTIFICATIONS

ISO 9001:2015/AS9100D
Mil-I-45208A
Boeing Company D6-82479
ITAR-Compliant


PRODUCTS

LAST-A-FOAM® rigid and flexible polyurethane foam products, renowned for their strength, stability, uniformity and unique physical characteristics, satisfy wide-ranging applications and meet the highest standards.

MARKETS

We provide creative solutions for diverse industries. Our expertise, high-quality foam materials, and cost-effective solutions have enabled us to support engineers and design teams from dynamic industries.

OUR CAPABILITIES
SUB-ASSEMBLY

Our high-capacity production facility enables us to provide customers with end-to-end solutions including fabrication of sub-assemblies. With our help, customers can reduce manufacturing steps to optimize their supply chain.

CAST / MOLDED PARTS

We produce custom-mold parts using flexible and semi-flexible polyurethane foam materials. Our unique formulations and built-to-print capabilities enable us to provide optimal solutions for density-to-part-weight control, void control, surface quality, and physical properties.

MACHINING

Our production facility includes multiple sizes of CNC machines, including 5-axis machines, to fit your needs and specifications. Our customer service, engineering, and CNC teams will work closely with you from concept to completion.

TOOLING

Our comprehensive services enables us to manage all aspects of your custom program. This includes supporting you with part and tool design and mold tooling manufacture as we produce parts through all phases of completion.

THERMOFORMING

We offer vacuum forming services for various thermoform materials such as ABS, polycarbonate, acrylic and PVC/ABS mix. Materials are formed to customers’ specific size and shape requirements.

COMPLEX LAMINATES

We provide build-to-print standard and custom complex laminates for myriad parts and assemblies. We have created laminate parts for diverse military, commercial, industrial, aerospace and marine applications.

About UPG

At our state-of-the-art facilities in Texas, the United Kingdom and China, our experienced engineers deliver concept to completion services for customers worldwide. We are a single-source supplier for high volume, precision injection molding, value-added assemblies and contract manufacturing, including design, prototyping, tooling design and manufacture. Our expertise in processing high-performance engineering resins and manufacturing high quality, precision parts has made us the plastic injection molding OEM of choice for customers in the data center, automotive, healthcare, energy and industrial sectors around the globe.

Alkon is a prominent manufacturer in North America, specializing in pneumatic and hydraulic components designed for both industrial and mobile markets. Our product range encompasses fittings, valves, cylinders, pumps, and lift jacks.

SEE THE ALKON DIFFERENCE

INDUSTRIAL
PRODUCT SOLUTIONS

The integration of our Alkon, Allenair, and Star product lines provides a comprehensive range of components to address various industrial pneumatic and hydraulic requirements. Our extensive product portfolio equips us with everything necessary for the complete design and production of industrial motion control systems. This encompasses a diverse array of products such as fittings, valves, cylinders, and pumps.

MOBILE
PRODUCT SOLUTIONS

Tailored for the challenging environmental conditions encountered both on and off the road, our mobile product portfolio is meticulously crafted. We offer a complete set of complementary products for the design of pneumatic and hydraulic systems, drawing from our Alkon, AIRman, and Star product lines.

THE ALKON DIFFERENCE

At Alkon, our actions are rooted in our core values, with a primary focus on safety. We consider it our responsibility to prioritize the well-being of our employees, customers, and all those associated with our products. This commitment translates into placing utmost importance on quality and rigorous testing to not only meet governmental standards but also surpass the expectations of our customers.

THE ALKON FAMILY OF COMPANIES

Drawing on our extensive 75-year history in pneumatics and hydraulics, we have strategically acquired companies that align with our core values while enhancing and complementing our existing product offerings. Among these acquisitions are Star Hydraulics, Allenair, and AIRman Products. This strategic approach has empowered us to harness our wealth of experience and deep product insights to provide our customers with a competitive advantage, enabling them to emerge as leaders in their respective markets.

MRPC is a world class, FDA Registered, and ISO 13485 certified full contract manufacturer of medical devices, instruments, and disposables. With full range product lifecycle capabilities including design assistance, development, and manufacturing, MRPC is a turn-key manufacturing partner to some of the world’s largest medical device companies.

CORE COMPETENCIES
DESIGN FOR MANUFACTURABILITY

The Design for Manufacturability process is a key engineering practice employed by MRPC to ensure ease of manufacturing, improve quality, reduce costs and reduce time-to-market.

READ MORE
SILICONE MOLDING, PLASTIC MOLDING & EXTRUSIONS

MRPC utilizes a systematic approach to projects involving clean room silicone and plastic injection molding. We start by assisting customers in design for moldability through SOLIDWORKS® Plastics and other software’s.

READ MORE
MULTI-MATERIAL MOLDING

MRPC has developed unique processes for multi-material molding of dissimilar materials onto each other, and gaining the properties of both materials. Our multi-material molding processes ensure product integrity, reliability and safety, while improving the form, fit and function of your final product.

READ MORE
FINISHED MEDICAL DEVICE ASSEMBLY

At MRPC, we believe in being a total solutions partner. This includes providing device assembly, packaging, and sterilization management of finished medical devices.

READ MORE
GLOBAL SUPPLY CHAIN DEVELOPMENT & MANAGEMENT

As your full-service medical device contract manufacturer, your projects will benefit from MRPC’s streamlined efficiencies. Thatʼs why we offer full global supply chain development and management.

Utilizing epoxy, phenolic, melamine, and silicone resin systems on nearly limitless different reinforcements, Norplex-Micarta offers composite material solutions to designers worldwide. From demanding high voltage equipment, to the cold of space, to the pressure of oil and gas exploration in the depths of the earth and nearly everywhere in between, Norplex-Micarta’s materials can be engineered to your specific requirements.

Applications engineering, process development, and materials engineering to support the hybrid, co-molding, of continuous fiber prepregs with molding compounds.

ENABLEX™

Thermoset composite sheets, tubes and other stock shapes for bearing and wear applications in the transportation, energy, and industrial markets.

ENDURX™

Specialty designed and proven thermoset composite sheets and tubing for cryogenic applications in energy, aerospace, medical and scientific markets.

CRYOLAM™

Micarta® and G-10 for cosmetic and aesthetic applications in a range of consumer products. These robust, durable, long lasting materials are available through a network of authorized resellers.

GO TO ULTREXCOMPOSITES.COM
When designing with composites, the possibilities are nearly endless.

Norplex-Micarta has hundreds of standard materials that can be used as a starting point to baseline an application. We work collaboratively with designers to identify material and process options, and then establish a design validation and verification plan. All of this is done with economics and ongoing mass production in mind from the start, with a company that has invested specifically to produce thermoset composite materials consistently, economically, and at scale.

Featured Markets

Norplex-Micarta is one of North America’s leading producers of thermoset composite pre-pregs, sheets, and shapes. These hybrid and multi-material solutions are prized for their design flexibility, consistency, and value.

Convenient, Single-Source Precision Manufacturing with Global Reach

For over fifty years, companies of all sizes have selected PLITEK® for our engineering expertise, high volume precision manufacturing capacity, and quality of service. Our vertically integrated capabilities can save you time and cost. Whether your requirement is 500 or 5,000,000 pieces, our state-of-the-art converting equipment offers notable capabilities.

Our vertically integrated business model has been designed to allow our customers the convenience of a streamlined manufacturing process along with process control and efficient timeline. We offer the ability and resources to begin our business relationship with small runs for prototype development, feasibility studies, and process validation to full-scale manufacturing. We can provide guidance with material selection and optimization to bring your idea to efficient full-scale manufacturing.  

Combination of engineering expertise, materials science, prototyping capabilities, ISO Class 8 clean rooms, and vertically integrated manufacturing allow us to provide innovative solutions for even the most complex converting requirements. 

Our US-based manufacturing and design operations are located near Chicago, a top logistics and manufacturing hub. Our reach is global, serving businesses in regional markets to companies with multinational supply chains.

Package Degassing System

Reliable, cost-effective and environmentally-friendly one-way degassing valves and vents for a wide range of product packaging applications including coffee, pet food, vitamins, fruits and vegetables, products with yeast, and other products requiring head space gas evacuation from sealed packaging. PLI-VALV® one-way degassing valves enable head-space gases from inside of sealed packaging to escape while providing an effective barrier to environmental oxygen, moisture, and contamination keeping products fresh. 

LEARN MORE
Custom Film Extrusion

PLITEK® specializes in extruding custom films in an ISO Class 8 clean room. We have the ability to extrude smaller startup quantities supporting our customers from a design and development phase, through high volume production and commercialization. Custom films can be provided in roll form, sheet form, or as precision die cut components tailored to meet specific application requirements.

As part of our continual vertical integration, we are in the process of adding new extruding capabilities: co-extrusion and polypropylene meltblown filter media extrusion.

LEARN MORE
PLI-TAB® hang tabs and display strips are manufactured from premium material under strict quality control for strong, self-adhering tabs to securely attach to a range of items.
Hang Tabs & Display Strips

High-quality hang tabs and display strips display products at eye-level that help increase sales. We stock a wide variety of PLI-TAB® hang tabs, wobblers and vertical display strips.

Provider of Flexible Coated Substrates
From Coated Flexible Materials to Engineered Roll-to-Roll Coating Solutions
Kimoto Functional Films

Kimoto Tech, Inc. (KTI) located in Cedartown, GA is a wholly owned subsidiary of Kimoto Company, Ltd. Headquartered in Saitama, Japan.

Kimoto Tech is an industry leader in the research, development and processing of solution based chemistries, coatings and adhesives applied via a roll-to- roll (R2R) process utilizing a wide range of flexible substrates. We have been providing coating, laminating and formulation solutions for over 60 years globally.

Our technology platforms include print receptive coatings (thermal imaging, toner receptive, inkjet, digital, print transfer), protective coatings (hardcoats, UV barriers, chemical resistance, flame retardant, oleophobic), diffusion coatings (anti-glare, matte, reflective, illumination, light shielding), adhesive coatings (pressure sensitive, self-wet, optically clear), specialty coatings (conductive, ITO alternatives, anti-stat) and custom created multi-layer constructions.

Leveraging our global R&D and production resources we are working on advances in product design, chemistry formulation and coating technology aimed at providing functional solutions for the next generation of products utilizing flexible coated materials.

Please contact us and give us the opportunity to introduce our range of products and technologies.

The Kimoto Tech USA Team

Product Technologies
Hardcoat Films

Hardcoated polyester and polycarbonate films with enhanced scratch and chemical resistance

Light Management Films

Films that provide reflection, diffusion and transmission of light to enhance the performance of lighting systems and optical displays

Conductive Films

PET film coated with a transparent conductive polymer (TCP) as an alternative to ITO to provide a flexible conductive surface

Surface Protection Films

Films that protect displays, touch screens/panels and human-machine-interfaces (HMI's) from physical and chemical damage

Glass Protection Films

Coated films that provide functionality and design for glass - imaging, environmental protection and safety/security

Graphic Films

Films and processing methods for computer-to-plate (CTP) systems to create film positives and printing plates for screenprinting

Processing Films

Adhesive backed films used in converting and processing that provide temporary protection, bonding or in-process functionality

Custom Coating

Toll Coating & Custom Coating Solutions / Films made to customer specifications

Plastic-Mart.com is the nation's largest supply of above ground & underground plastic tank sizes. From plastic septic tanks to rainwater tanks, RV tanks to boat tanks, we carry it all! Custom plastic tanks are our specialty, and we can create just about any type or size of plastic tank that fits your needs. We also offer a wide variety of water tanks for many projects and applications, including industrial tanks, steel tanks, and poly tanks. We are proud to be the #1 retailer for storage tanks & plastic tanks, and we offer very competitive prices. We service all commercial, industrial, residential "farm/dairy/ranch," & custom jobs from start to finish. Allow our specialists to assist in helping you reach your goal. We offer large and small water tanks in various styles and materials, including HDPE (High Density Polyethylene) tanks. Our rotational mold process allows us to produce any plastic tank of any size or shape - so give us a call today for custom orders.

Over 65 Years of Excellence in Foam Fabrication

Since 1952 Foamcraft, Inc. has led the polyurethane foam fabrication industry. With a network of five facilities across Indiana that account for over 420,000 square feet of fabrication space, along with a dedicated focus on Quality, Service, Innovation, and Expertise, Foamcraft sets itself apart from its competition.

QUALITY

Foamcraft maintains a state-of-the-art Quality Assurance Lab that regularly verifies crucial foam properties such as density, IFD, compression set, air flow, and more. Additionally, our Quality Manual ensures dimensional inspection, confirming only the highest quality fabricated parts are shipped.

LEARN MORE
SERVICE

By developing the concept of the FoamTeam, Foamcraft has committed itself to a level of teamwork that provides the highest level of service at every level of our organization. We strive, every day, to truly serve both our employees and our customers in hopes of exceeding expectations.

LEARN MORE
INNOVATION

Foamcraft utilizes only the most technologically advanced foam fabrication equipment. From the efficient accuracy of CNC contour machines, to Comfort Saver surface modification, our foam products utilize the most innovative fabrication techniques in the industry.

LEARN MORE
EXPERTISE

The Foamcraft management team and plant employees alike bring to the table hundreds of combined years of experience to the polyurethane foam fabrication industry. The expertise and experience provided by the Foamcraft team is second to none.

Welcome to ASWF

American Standard Window Film offers a full line of window films for the automotive, residential and commercial market at our new factory located in Las Vegas, Nevada. With our leadership team drawing from vast experience in window film manufacturing, the new machinery was customized for increased production efficiency, faster turnaround times and greater cleanliness resulting in superior product quality offered at a competitive price. One of the unique innovations that increase production efficiency is our inline three coating head with an automated rewind system. ASWF is the only manufacturer in the world with this type of system.

Let’s Build a Great Package Together

Every now and again we like to craft and release videos to show what Portco is all about and to punctuate what we can do for your brand and product line. This latest video features Portco’s President and CEO, Kent Wall, the 3rd generation leader of the company that was started by his grandfather almost 90 years ago. Kent talks about what is at the core of the company, how innovative and responsive it can and has to be in this continually changing world. Let’s start a conversation.

Packaging with Peace of Mind

We are a 3rd generation family run company. We strive to make the highest quality, safest packaging in the most responsible way – for brands, we’re really passionate about. We have a wide range of fiercely loyal clients because we stand behind every package we sell. One of the first west coast packaging companies to earn the highest level of SQF, the highest rating for food safety in our industry. We make multi-wall bags, stand-up pouches, and printed roll stock. We view our packaging as another ingredient – protecting your fresh, frozen, dry, and wet goods with the same standards of food safety as you do.

Our plants are located on each side of Mt. Adams in the state of Washington. Our packaging appears on store aisles from Milwaukie to Melbourne.

Associations and Certifications

As we strive to maintain the highest level of safety and compliance in the flexible packaging industry, we are active members in several associations and the recipient of several important certifications that ensure safety and quality. Click here to explore. 

Sustainability Options

When it comes to packaging, consumers continue to demand more sustainable options and regulations continue to change. This trend will continue to influence buying decisions when choosing a product on the store shelf or e-commerce space.  To address these demands and support your brand, Portco Packaging™ has developed the EarthGuard™ line of options to address your company’s individual needs regarding sustainability. The EarthGuard™ line offers PCR Solutions, Recycle Ready, Compostable, and Bio-assimilated options. Explore EarthGuard here.

 

What does a packaging mistake cost?

A mistake or contamination in our industry costs way more than just a reprint of packaging – in ingredients, processing, time, delivery delays and retailer confidence.  One broken link in the food chain affects all others. So it was an easy decision to obtain the highest level of certification a food packaging can achieve with SQF. That’s peace of mind with your product and reputation on the line. It also reflects something else: we sweat the details. There’s a reason we’ve studied all pages of the SQF Food Safety Code for Manufacturing of Food Packaging and the SQF Quality Code…so you don’t have to. 

SQF is recognized by retailers and food service providers around the world who require a rigorous, credible food safety management system.

Relentless Pursuit of a Better Way

At Portco, it's our mission to make the highest quality, safest flexible packaging in the most responsible way. We'll be the first to explore the way - ensuring the journey is safe and easy to follow.

For decades, Polymer has manufactured close-tolerance plastic parts and assemblies for blue-chip customers with demanding applications worldwide. We are the world’s leading producer of liquid resin cast parts and an award-winning producer of injection-molded parts, machined plastic parts, and quick-turn PolyProto™ parts. We do it right, do it fast, and do it cost effectively. Give us a call.

As a single-contact source with multiple capabilities, PTR provides you with the genuine opportunity to not only reduce your vendor supply base but also realize significant efficiencies in manufacturing and purchasing. PTR Group companies include American Cap Company, LLC, PTR Tool & Plastics, LLC, ACCI Industries, and Premier Hydraulics, LLC.

American Cap Company, LLC is a global leader in manufacturing compressed gas cylinder accessories and other cylinder components. In addition to compressed gas, ACC’s subject matter expertise in producing casing couplings, accessories and machine per print equipment for the energy sector, is unmatched.

Learn More

ACCI Industries is focused on providing long-term, multi-capability, contract manufacturing services for metal components and subassemblies for OEM, industrial, energy, government, and military applications. Giving life to engineered design through custom fabrication, air tight quality and superior customer service.

Learn More

PTR Tool & Plastics, LLC is a leading supplier of world-class, high-precision thermoplastic injection mold tooling and molded components for the automotive, electronics, aerospace, telecommunications, consumer, energy and disposable medical supply industries.

Learn More

Premier Hydraulics, LLC offers a full spectrum of machining, assembly, and fabrication services, from prototype quantities thru high-volume production. We produce parts both domestically and offshore, utilizing in-house capacity, contract manufacturing, and outside services.

Learn More
Markets Served
PTR Group offers products and services tailored to a variety of markets to fit their customers’ needs.
Automotive

Supplying OEMs and Tier Ones for the last 28 years, we serve three primary areas: under the hood, electrical, and interior.

Consumer

We offer OEMs tooling solutions and molding capabilities to reduce total cost and lead time without compromising quality.

Medical

Our engineering, tooling, and molding capabilities are at one location, which allows projects to move seamlessly streamlining the process.

Telecom

We provide precision tooling and parts, as well as offer suggestions early on in the mold development process to make the project successful. We have worked with companies such as TYCO (AMP), FCI-BURNDY, IBM, Molex, Robinson Nugent (3M), Osram Sylvania, and FCI Electronics.

Energy

We manufacture high quality thread protectors, seamless premium couplings and accessories for the upstream oil & gas industry as well as line pipe couplings, flanges, and refinery components for the midstream and downstream sectors. Our system efficiencies, extensive supply chain infrastructure and state-of-the-art facilities position PTR Group to compete across the country and across the globe.

Specialty Gas

We manufacture cylinder caps, valve protection, and other related compressed gas components for the industrial, compressed, and specialty gas markets of North America, South America, Europe, and Asia.

Davalor brings nearly 40 years of experience in all aspects of plastic injection molding — from design to tooling to production. And we put that experience to work in an innovative, team-based, technology-infused work environment that’s focused on meeting the highest standards in our industry.

HOW WE CAN HELP

ANY PART

Our design-to-manufacturing capabilities give us the process control we need to produce virtually any part, including parts with extremely complex geometries, exacting surface standards, and some of the most rigorous quality standards in our industry. And we repeat that success in hundreds of millions of parts every year.

ANY RESIN

Our deep knowledge of resins and resin delivery systems creates greater possibilities in the design and function of our part. We're experienced in virtually all resins, including OEM color matches and resins engineered specifically for our customers. applications across many industries.

ANY INDUSTRY

We're proud of our capacity to work alongside top automotive, appliance, and other manufacturers. Whether it's perfect Class A surfaces or trusted automotive safety components, we bring deep experience and patented innovation to every project.

CAPABILITIES

Experienced Team

Our engineers, designers, toolmakers, quality inspectors, and manufacturing managers work in experienced, cross-functional teams to ensure consistently excellent parts. Our team approach means projects transition smoothly and efficiently without any hiccups between design, build, and production. We’ve been working this way for almost 40 years. And we’re on a trajectory of growth that will take us well into the next 40.

Sustainability You Can Count On

At United Solutions, we are committed to promoting a sustainable future by designing and manufacturing products that are durable, long lasting and minimize the environmental impacts at the end of a product’s useful life.

From product planning and design to delivery, we take pride in following the three pillars of Reduce, Reuse and Recycle.

Our products are designed to provide a lifetime’s worth of value, reducing the need for frequent replacement and avoiding the associated environmental costs. Over 30% of our total plastic usage is currently recycled material.

Through innovation in product life cycles, manufacturing and operations, we are also finding find new ways to cut emissions, reduce our carbon footprint, recycle source materials and reduce waste.

About Us

Mutsutech S.A. de C.V.

We were founded in 1988 specializing in custom injection molding and plastic molded parts decoration.

 

Our manufacturing facilities are located in Tijuana, B.C. and Monterrey, N.L., Mexico. with its corporate office at Chula Vista, CA. USA.




 

CLICK HERE TO CONTACT US >>

Mutsutech S.A. de C.V.

Full service company of plastic injection molding.

 

MISSION

Our MISSION is to become the leading manufacturer of quality injection molded parts in the region, providing quality service, technical expertise and a shorter turnaround time at less cost.

 

ENVIROMENTAL POLICY

We at Mutsutech acknowledge that it is everyone's responsibility to protect the natural environment.

Therefore we will promote environmental protection activities according to 4 basic concepts:

Reduce Energy consumption
Reduce Water consumption
Reduce Waste & Scrap
Prevent environmental pollution caused by chemical substances
Eliminate Accidents
	 	
QUALITY

At Mutsutech we are committed to stablish a framework that satisfies and enhance our customers and interested parties expectations and requirements, by achieving our objectives, contributing to the well being of our employees and then improve continuously our quality management system, applying the following aspects:

Quality Assurance of our processes.
Encourage to our employees to look forward continuous improvement.
Take advantage of our strengths to enhance customer satisfaction.
